unit.info: Un phénix qui a muté à cause des radiations, s'adaptant à la vie dans les Terres Désolées. Malgré sa séduisante apparence, il est plutôt dangereux à cause de sa capacité à cracher des flammes radioactives. Un phénix funeste n'est pas agressif envers les âmes ayant encore de la pitié en elles. Il peut être vaincu, et ensuite être un ami et compagnon.
Un petit robot de sécurité qui peut aussi servir d'assistant personnel ou de secrétaire. Possède une arme laser plutôt puissante, et ça c'est chouette

Poney - Une espèce dominante vivant à Equestria. Ils sont divisés en 3 races: licornes, pégases, et poneys terrestres. Chaque race possèdent ses avantages et ses désavantages. Les licornes possèdent la télékinésie, et avec un entrainement spécial, elles peuvent exceller dans différents sorts, les pégases peuvent voler, et les poneys terrestres sont les plus forts, endurants et tenaces de tous. On peut fréquemment rencontrer des licornes et des poneys terrestres dans les Terres Désolées. Les pégases sont rarement rencontrés, car la plupart d'entre eux vivent dans leurs villes de nuages et ne descendent jamais. Zèbres - Habitants d'un pays lointain, l'ennemi principal des poneys pendant la Grande Guerre. Aujourd'hui, leurs descendants sont parfois aperçus dans Equestria, et, malgré que des siècles soient passés, leurs vieille rivalité n'a pas été oubliée. Les zèbres ne possèdent pas la magie comme les licornes mais peuvent se servir de la sorcellerie, malédiction, potions, et amulettes, et certains conaissent l'art de la nécromance. Les griffons ne sont pas nombreux dans Equestria, et la pluparts d'entre eux sont mercenaires. Physiquement ils sont plus fort que des poneys, et ont la possibilité de voler, mais ne possèdent pas de pouvoir magique.

Les pillards sont des bandits, des poneys terrestres et des unicornes vivant dans la délinquance et le pillage, employant toujours la force brute. Ce sont un grand fléau des Terres Désolées qui ont hérité des pires caractéristiques possibles. Les pillards sont par conséquent extrêmement agressifs, cruels, avides, vicieux, et tout simplement fous. Ils sont toujours sales et pleins de blessures. Les pillards sont souvent en groupes, voire dans de grands gangs dirigés par des leaders. Ils établissent des repaires dans des immeubles abandonnés, pratiques pour piller des colonies ou voler des caravanes commerciales et des voyageurs. Quiquonque envahissant ses territoires sera immédiatement attaqué. Ils sont en général peu armés avec des armes de mêlée ou de vieilles armes à feu usées, et leurs armures sont faites à partir de multiples déchets.

Psychotiques et maniaques, il n'y a rien qu'ils aiment plus qu'humilier et torturer leurs victimes. En combat, leurs meilleurs amis sont les armes blanches ainsi que leurs sabots. À cause de leurs stupides habitude de "décorer" leurs habitations avec des fragments de cadavres en décomposition, ils souffrent constamment de nombreuses maladies.
Considérés comme des déchets, même par les standards des pillards. Ils sont toujours habillés comme des sacs, armés de déchets, et une santé affaiblie par l'usage abondant d'alcool et de drogues.

Les pillards de Metalhead adorent s'équiper de diverses pièces de métals, qu'ils appellent "armure". À cause de ça, ils sont très lourds et lents, mais ils sont aussi très bien protégés des coups et des balles. Ils utilisent des piques en métal pour décorer leur armure.
Le gang des Lechers est une collection de toutes les vices connues. Ils sont rancuniers, avides, lascifs, en un mot de rares salauds. Ils préfèrent les armes de mêlée grosses et lourdes.

Les pillards des Rebelles valorisent la liberté plus que tout au monde. Selon eux, ils l'expriment par l'abilité de voler librement et de violer n'importe quel poney qu'ils veulent. Ils sont armés d'armes à feu légères, comme des pistolets.

La conscience des pillards des Exécuteurs est lourde avec de nombreuses colonies, ruinées et détruites jusqu'au dernier habitant. Ce sont des tueurs sans foi ni loi qui tuent juste pour le plaisir. Parfois armés de fusils à pompe, ils sont particulièrement dangereux de près.

Les Vétérans sont les groupes de pillards les plus dangereux, organisés et suréquippsé. Selon les normes des pillards, ils ont une bonne armure et de bonnes armes, et en plus, ils savent comment les utiliser.

Les pillards du gang de Scorcher sont connu pour leur (non sans danger) soif de feu. En combat, ils se servent de lance-flammes et autres armes incendiaires, la plupart d'entre eux pètent le feu (littéralement).

Les Bombers sont simplement obsédés par les explosifs. Ils ont toujours une grenade avec eux, et ne ratent jamais une occasion de s'en servir. Cela les rend probablements plus dangereux que les autres pillards, [insérer jeu de mot avec explosion].
Les chefs sont presque toujours les plus grands, les plus puissants et les plus cruels des pillards.

Des bandits dont le but principal est de vendre leurs victimes en tant qu'esclaves. Ils ont beau être presque aussi cruels et immoraux que les pillards et les esclavagistes, ils sont bien plus "civilisés". Leurs gangs sont nombreux et bien organisés, possèdent des chefs compétents, une hiérarchie précise et une distribution de responsabilités. Les esclavagistes connaissent plutôt bien leur cruel métier, et ils utilisent de bien meilleures armes et armures que les pillards. Tout cela les rend encore plus dangerereux à combattre.

Les bergers occupent la plus basse hiérarchie des esclavagistes. Leur but est de transporter et d'escorter les esclaves à leur point de vente. Ils sont généralement armés d'armes blanches, et leurs armures, en accord avec leurs bas rang, est d'assez mauvaise qualité.

Le but des attrapeurs est de traquer et de capturer de nouveaux esclaves. La plupart des esclaves viennent de pillards, de nomades et de voyageurs, mais les chasseurs attaquent souvent des colonies pacifiques en prenant tous les résidents forts et en bonne santé et en tuant tous les autres. Ils sont armés de diverses armes et sont plutôt dangereux pour un voyageur seul.

Les devoirs des gardiens sont de surveiller les esclaves, empêcher leur évasion, maintenir l'ordre et d'exécuter les punitions (le dernier est en général effectué avec enthousiasme) Ils accompagnent souvent les chasseurs lors de raids. Equipés d'armes à feu et représente un danger considérable en combat.

Les gardes sont la force principale des esclavagistes. Ils servent de couverture et de support dans les raids et protègent les camps de menaces extérieures. Ils s'occupent aussi des autres esclavagistes et règle brutalement les problèmes avec les fauteurs de troubles. Ils sont armés de diverses armes et ont une bonne armure.

Les gardes d'élite sont de vrais professionels - forts, doués et bien équipés. La plupart du temps, ils protègent les chefs de gangs ou participent aux raids risqués. À choisir, il vaut mieux tomber sur un dragon goule.

Habituellement, les chefs sont choisis parmi les esclavagistes les plus rusés, les plus chanceux et les plus impitoyables. Ils commandent souvent de grands groupes de chasseurs, de bergers et de gardiens, qu'ils conduisent à la chasse.

Les mercenaires, aussi connu sous le nom de "Talon", est une organisation semi-militaire constituée principalement de griffons. Il comprend de nombreuses fractions indépendantes, chacune avec son propre chef. Bien que certains mercenaires aient leur propre code d'honneur, la plupart d'entre eux sont de simples canailles qui ne s'intéressent qu'à l'argent et ne sont limités par aucune morale. Ils entreprennent n'importe quel travail, qu'il s'agisse de meurtres à forfait, d'enlèvements ou de traite des esclaves, et ne montrent aucune pitié pour leurs victimes. Les mercenaires ont, en règle générale, de bien meilleures armes que les autres habitants des Terres Desolé

Les éclaireurs de Talons viennent toujours devant les forces principales. Leur tâche est d'observer la situation, de recueillir des informations et de trouver des cibles. En règle générale, les éclaireurs sont faiblement armés et ne portent que des armures légères

Les forces principales des troupes de Talons. Leur tache est d'être a l'avant garde de la bataille. À cette fin, ils ont une bonne armure et des armes comme des fusils de chasse et des fusils d'assaut
L'objectif principal du griffon lourd est le tir de suppression pour forcer son ennemi à se cacher. Il préfère les armes lourdes, quitte à sacrifier son armure.
Les snipers gardent leurs distances pour éliminer leurs cibles de loin. Parfois armés de fusil de gros calibre, ils représentent une menace considérable.

Les combattants de Talon les plus expérimentés. Ils portent une armure de combat et se servent des meilleurs armes modernes, qu'ils manient à la perfection. En plus, ils ont des lames attachées aux ailes.

On dirait que certains zèbres ne savent pas que la Grande Guerre s'est terminée deux cents ans plus tôt. Récemment, l'organisation militaire zèbre connue sous le nom de la Légion, a commencé à gagner en puissance. Le but de leurs chefs est inconnu, mais il est clair que rien de bon ne peut se produire venant de leur part. Les zèbres ont un excellent talent de camouflage, sont maîtres du déguisement et de l'embuscade, et sont mortels en combat rapproché

Personne ne sait ce que les espions de la Légion recherchent - les zèbres ne négocient avec personne. Ils agissent toujours discrètement et furtivement, mais dès qu'ils sont repérés, ils foncent au combat avec rage.

Les saboteurs de la Légion pénètrent secrètement les immeubles détruits des Terres Désolées en emportant avec eux un grand stock d'explosifs. Pour quoi ? Personne ne sait, mais ce ne sont probablement pas pour de bonnes intentions.
Le manteau enchanté de l'assassin le rend quasiment invisible. Rien ne montre leur présence sauf un tir fatal d'un sniper.
Bien entraînés et armés, les combattants de la Légion frappent rapidement puis battent en retraite, disparaissant dans l'obscurité de la nuit.

Les officiers de la Légion s'habillent généralement avec une armure ou une robe traditionnelle. Elles ne protègent pas beaucoup des balles, mais leur apparence monte le moral des soldats légionnaires.

Les zèbres nécromanciens sont de puissants ensorceleurs, en aucun cas inférieurs aux meilleurs magiciens unicornes. Mais, contrairement à eux, les nécromanciens ne comptent plus sur les sorts d'attaques, mais plutôt sur les sorts obscurs et les invocations de diverses créatures et d'esprits.

Une des factions post-guerre les plus importantes d'Equestria. Ranger d'acier - Une organisation militaire fermée, constituée de poneys terrestres et de licornes, proclamant son objectif de trouver et de préserver la technologie d'avant-guerre. Ils sont caractérisés par l'agressivité, l'intolérance envers les étrangers et une attitude généralement méprisante envers les autres habitants des Terres Désolées, qu'ils appellent simplement « sauvages ». Ils possèdent de nombreuses technologies rares, ne respectent pas les armes plus petites qu'un minigun et sont particulièrement célèbres pour leur armure assistée - l'héritage du ministère de la Technologie de guerre. Armure puissante, armes puissantes, robots de combat et morale perverse à peine mieux que les pillards - tout cela fait des rangers d'acier l'un des adversaires les plus dangereux que vous ayez à affronter.

Les Chevaliers sont la force principale des Rangers d'Acier, le rang le plus bas de leur hiérarchie militaire. Ils sont organisés en divisions commandées par des croisés ou en d'importantes formations.

Les Croisés sont des officiers subalternes, à peu près analogues aux sergents de l'armée d'Equestria, qui dirigent de petits détachements de huit gardes d'acier et exécutent les ordres des commandants supérieurs.
Les Paladins sont des officiers subalternes, commandant de grandes divisions de trente-quatre rangers d'acier. Ils signalent directement aux paladins seniors.

L'organisation militaire des pégases qui a emergé des restes des anciennes forces aériennes d'Equestria, ayant apporté leur aide aux autres poneys durant la Guerre. Peu avant la fin de la Guerre, les leaders pégases ont refusé de se battre plus longtemps avec les zèbres et ont fermé le ciel avec une barrière de nuages, se séparant du reste de l'équinité. Les officiers commandants de l'Enclave voient les habitants des Terres Désolées comme des menaces à la société des pégases et eux-mêmes comme des dirigeants. Actuellement, l'Enclave possède les technologies les plus avancées de tout Equestria incluant les dirigeables de combat, la dernière génération des armes à énergie magique et des armures assistées spécialement conçues pour les pégases.

Les Officiers de l'Enclave sont rarement rencontrés en dehors des zones fortifiées, des bases militaires et des dirigeables. Ils ne portent pas d'armure assistée et sont par conséquent de faibles adversaires.

Les Eclaireurs de l'Enclave se déplacent parfois sur le front. Ils portent une armure assistée légère qui laissent leurs ailes à découvert mais ils possèdent des traqueurs leur permettant de localiser les ennemis même bien camouflés.

Les membres de l'unité d'assaut opèrent généralement en groupes de trois pégases appelés "ailes". Leur armure assistée peut résister à des dégâts importants, possède des canons à énergie magique intégrée et une "queue de scorpion" pour le combat rapproché.

Les membres de l'Unité d'assaut d'élite sont la fierté de l'armée de l'Enclave. Ils portent une armure assistée améliorée, qui protège parfaitement contre tout dommage, et utilisent des armes à énergie magique particulièrement mortelles.
Une escouade speciale de trois pégases. Ils exécutent seulement les ordres du commandant en chef de l'Enclave.

L'Equestria d'après-guerre est habitée par des hordes de divers monstres, bêtes et mutants. Certains d'entre eux sont apparus sous l'influence de radiations, de souillures ou de diverses malédictions magiques, tandis que d'autres ont été créés artificiellement.

Les goules sont des poneys horriblement brulé par les radiation. Ceux qui représentent un danger sont appelé les goules sauvages - ceux qui ont perdu la raison et sont devenu des zombies assoifé de sang

Les goules sauvages classique sont trouvable un peu partout dans les Terre Désolé. Mais principalement dans les endroits abandonné et désolés , comme des ruines et les égouts, mais surtout dans les zones radioactives
La mutation de cette espèces de goule n'a pas diminuer leurs forces ou leurs vitesse - au contraire, elles ont été ammélioré. Aussi, ils ont dévellopé la capacité de sauter plus haut et plus loin
La capacité de télékinésie des licornes goules n'est devenue plus forte qu'après la mutation. Vous devez faire attention à leur prise télékinésique
Les produits d'activité vitale de ce genre de goules représentent une véritable collection de substances toxiques. En attaquant, ils peuvent libérer des nuages ​​de gaz toxique

Celle-ci brille a cause du taux de radiation élevé qu'elle contient. Si vous vous faites toucher, vous ne prendrez pas seulements des dégats physique mais aussi une bonne dose de radiation. Ils peuvent créer un souffle radioactif qui va soigner les goules autours de lui

Un poney terrestre soldat transformé en goule Earth pony soldier turned into a ghoul. It still wears remnants of armor, and its physical strength has incredibly increased after mutation. Just by stomping hooves on the ground, he can make a small earthquake

A mutation of this ghoul went further compared to its relatives. Its strength, speed, and aggression has increased multiple times, sharp spines appeared on the body, and in addition, it acquired an ability to spit acid. As a result, it became one of the most dangerous mutants in the Wasteland

There is a specific kind of wild ghouls roaming the ruins of Canterlot that appeared not because of radiation but under influence of the pink cloud. They are especially dangerous because they can not be killed by ordinary bullets, as after "death" they revive. To kill these ghouls for good they must be burned or disintegrated. In addition, unicorn ghouls are able to use attack spells
The pink cloud penetrated so deeply into the dead flesh of these ghouls that it became their very essence. Now they are able to generate it at will
Probably the most dangerous of existing ghouls. It is notorious for incredible strength, speed and vitality. She attacks with black magic, from which no armor can protect

Alicorns are creatures transformed by the Goddess from ordinary ponies using the Impelled Metamorphosis Potion. They have a larger size than other ponies, huge wings and a long horn. They possess a wide range of abilities: they can fly, communicate using of telepathy, they excel at telekinesis, as well as combat and defensive spells. All together, this makes them ones of the most dangerous enemies

In addition to all other abilities, blue alicorns can use an invisibility spell. Hiding their presence for a while, they can insidiously attack from an ambush. They are also the most tenacious of alicorns
Purple alicorns possess powerful telekinesis, and in addition to all other abilities, are able to teleport themselves. Teleportation helps them evade enemy attacks or persistently pursue their target

Green alicorns can create extra-strong magic shields, and in addition to all other abilities, have a powerful gift for telepathy. With its help they can influence opponent`s mind, disorienting it or creating dreadful visions
A strange alicorn of black and red colors. It seems that she somehow combined special powers of all three types of alicorns, which made her an extremely dangerous opponent

Mutated descendants of diamond dogs, intelligent, but aggressive towards ponies and extremely dangerous. They have natural weapons - teeth and huge, sharp and strong claws on the front legs which can easily cut through metal and stone. They also have a good scent and can easily smell a hidden or even invisible enemy from close enough distance

The Enclave found a way to suppress will of Hellhounds using special helmets and transmitters, subduing them and thus turning these creatures into weapons. Because mind-controlling devices affect their brain, the Enclave Hellhounds lose a significant part of their wits, but not their strength, speed and ferocity

Bloatsprites are, apparently, parasprites, mutated under influence of taint or radiation. Acquiring new dangerous features, they have not lost their ability for intensive reproduction, thus their numbers in the Equestrian Wasteland are very high
Mutilated and increased in size vampire bats. Usually settle in empty and abandoned buildings, caves, under bridges and overpasses. Persistent in pursuit of their victims
The Canterlot subspecies of bloodwings, adapted to a pink cloud and much more terrifying
A predatory mutant fish living in sewers. Fast, agile and its bites are one hell of a pain
A predatory mutant fish living in sewers. It has powerful jaws and huge teeth and is not so easy to kill underwater
Monster fish, living in the pink waters of Canterlot
This small creature is rather annoying than dangerous
Bloatsprite spitting corrosive acid
Bloatsprite shooting poisonous spikes
Very large bloatsprite with a thick shell
Bloatsprite armed with razor-sharp teeth. This species is much more dangerous than others
This bloatsprite all soaked in a pink cloud and got the ability to spit its concentrate
A horrible and vile offspring of the pink cloud with sharp teeth. It is able to literally bite into its victim
An unusual and very dangerous specimen of bloatsprite, huge like a barrel and incredibly tenacious

A disgusting, pulsating, mucus-draining thing producing more and more new bloatsprites until destroyed. They say this might also be a bloatsprite, but monstrously mutated and grown to gigantic proportions
A common cockroach, mutated under the influence of radiation and increased in size. Not dangerous, but still capable of biting
It looks like an ordinary rat, only carnivorous and aggressive. Lives absolutely everywhere, as normal rats do
Un mutant hybride entre un rat et une taupe avec des dents tranchantes... trop meugnon
Mutant scorpion of impressive size with a strong chitinous shell and a deadly sting. It is extremely not recommended approaching it
It looks like a normal radscorpion, but instead of poison, injects an enzyme that prevents blood coagulation so that its victim can easily die from blood loss
A scorpio, turned under the influence of the pink cloud into an eerie monster. Bigger and much more dangerous than ordinary radscorpions
Giant mutated ant, biting very painfully
This mutant ant has really giant jaws, so that its bites are a problem for anypony
Mutant ant having a fire-making gland and capable of breathing fire
One of many exits of an underground ant colony. Unless destroyed, the ants will come out again and again in an endless stream

It is not known for certain what is the nature and origin of these strange creeping formations. It was hypothesized that this mucus is actually a colony of microorganisms that mutated under influence of taint. It is dangerous, as it contains corrosive acids and other unpleasant chemicals, but fortunately does not attack anypony, so it`s enough just avoiding stepping on it
A very unusual creeping mucus, striking everyone stepping on it with deadly cold
Creeping mucus, full of necromantic magic of the pink cloud. Under no circumstances should you touch it
Little can be said about the origin of this strange and frightening entity, except that it is a product of necromancy. Necrosprites freely pass through walls and physical attacks do them no harm

Robots are the product of technological revolution, one that Equestria experienced during the years before the Great War. They represent a combination of the most advanced earth pony technology and unicorn magic and were created for performing variable tasks - from housekeeping to property protection. During the War, combat models were also developed to be used in military operations. Although no pony produces robots nowadays, many of them are still functional despite centuries past. Mostly, these are combat and security robots that continue to execute built-in programs and are ready to bring all their power down upon any intruder entering their domain

Turrets are stationary robots designed to protect various objects. They have powerful weapons such as machine guns and magical energy weapons and they open fire on any violator stepping into their range. Typically, turrets are controlled by a common security system and can be disabled or reconfigured through the appropriate terminals

These turrets are mounted on the ceiling. They are fairly compact, but poorly protected from damage, and can be destroyed by breaking the mounts. There are concealed versions that come out only in combat mode
Ground turrets are mounted on the floor, they are well fortified and have a strong armor protecting them from bullets
Wall turrets are attached directly to the wall or mounted on a special rail, along which they can move from one end to the other. Their barrel can turn 360 degrees
This turret is mounted on a heavy, sturdy base and is protected by armored plates and a powerful force field effectively counteracting both mechanical and magical energy impact
Improved ceiling turrets. Unlike the rather flimsy conventional models, these are designed to protect military objects, and therefore have a reinforced body and strong armor

Class of pony size or even larger robots. Are designed for performing various tasks including military operations. Typically, such robots have advanced artificial intelligence, a strong metal casing, and magical energy weapons, especially powerful in combat models

One of the first serial models of multifunctional robots, in which a central processor is replaced with a real living brain, placed in a glass tank. It has two hose-like manipulators designed to perform various actions, caterpillar tracks and weak armament, like electric discharger or laser. In general, this model has many disadvantages and is hardly suitable for combat. Robobrains are rather sluggish, clumsy, dull and do not pose much threat

A common model of a security robot that looks like a pony. It can perform such functions as defending its owners, protecting property and military objects, maintaining order and enforcing the law and so on. For this purpose, they have strong armor and medium-power weapons. Some sluggishness is partly compensated by the built-in levitation device, allowing the robot soaring in the air for some time and moving to higher grounds. Despite the fact that their owners died centuries ago, the ponytrones continue patrolling the entrusted objects and do not tolerate any intruders

Military modification of the household robot "Mr. Handy", equipped with a whole arsenal of all kinds of weapons. There is a plasma gun for long range, a flamethrower for close one and a circular saw for direct contact with the enemy. For movement the robot uses levitation magic, allowing it to continuously soaring above the ground. During the War, these robots were actively used on the battlefields, and now there are not many of them left. Unfortunately, their electronic brains have long been bungled, and now they no longer distinguish friends from enemies

Equidroids, the gem of former Equestrian technology, were created shortly before the apocalypse. The first models were quite peaceful, but almost immediately there appeared combat modifications equipped with the latest weapons, energy barrier and even some spells. They did not participate in battles because of their exceptional complexity and high cost, but served rich and influential persons as guards and assistants, looking and behaving almost like living ponies. Now the surviving equidroids seem to have lost the last remnants of their electronic intelligence and pose a considerable danger

Modified security robot, much cooler than usual. Equipped with heavy weapons and armor, an improved mechanism of levitation, as well as a special electromagnet circuit that protects the robot from pulse weapons
Modified for the needs of the Steel Rangers "Mr. Gutsy", equipped with more sophisticated weapons

The combat robot, created by Robronco during the War, designed to protect the most important military, state and private facilities, as well to be on the front lines in combat operations. It is a real tank, much larger than a pony, moving on four wheels. It is well-armored and equipped with several types of heavy warfare, such as rapid-fire machine guns, missile launchers, and magical energy guns. Extremely dangerous in battle

The larger and more dangerous version of the Sentinel and, what`s more, a flying one. Ultra-sentinel is equipped with heavy armor, a magic shield, a plasma minigun, and a compact multiple rocket launcher. A battle with such an opponent is a serious trial for anypony
A combat drone greatly increased in size, a real flying tank. Usually protects the most important objects belonging to the Steel Rangers
Compact robots designed to perform certain tasks, do not have advanced AI and work solely on the program there were built with

A small flying robot, developed by the Ministry of Morale. Sprite bots were used as mobile transmitters, constantly broadcasting patriotic radio channel, while at the same time engaged in secret surveillance of citizens. Today sprite bots can still be found in plenty in the Wastelands. They usually do not represent danger, except when they are controlled by security systems of old closed strategic objects. In this case, they can try attacking the interloper using low-power weapons

Flying scout robot used to observe a situation and collect data during combat. It can both act autonomously or be controlled via a radio interface, transferring an image from robot`s camera directly to the operator`s visor. It can also be used in combat directly - its propeller`s blades are made of durable alloy and sharpened, making them quite suitable as a cutting weapon

Small security robots that resemble a metal globe. When a hostile object appears in their detection range, they begin rolling towards it, aiming to strike and shock with a powerful electric discharge. They can jump high and bounce from the walls

An improved roller equipped with its own plasma mini-reactor that gives it more power and explosiveness. In combination with high mobility and an exceptionally strong body it poses a considerable threat

Robot-bomb, apparently created by zebras. Unlike common mines, these do not wait for the enemy to step on them, but try getting closer themselves. They must never be allowed to come close - once they approach the target, they immediately explode

A small but quite dangerous flying robot. Has a durable composite case, active electric protection and a fairly powerful laser weapon. It is used to protect military and civilian facilities of special importance
Modified security drone, not so sturdy, but much faster and mobile. Armed with a high-voltage discharger and a plasma generator. Designed to accompany and support military units

Lightweight high-speed drone, often used by Enclave stormtroopers in combat. Thanks to its high maneuverability and advanced behavioral algorithms it can evade melee weapons, slow projectiles and even bullets

weapon.info: Covered with peeling red paint, scratches and some sticky yuck. Quite handy for breaking into common doors, lockers and cabinets. Useless against armored doors and safes
A tool for ponies with not so righteous source of income. Much sturdier than a crowbar, it can break even metal doors and concrete walls
Just a piece of rebar, covered with insulating tape for holding by teeth. You can hardly even call it "a weapon"
Composed of a sharpened metal part fastened by wire to a firm wooden stick
Unlike an ordinary spear, this one is made of firm bamboo with a tip perfectly sharpened and, for a cherry on top, poisoned
A large kitchen knife, not particularly suitable for a fight
With this huge and heavy knife you can chop a cabbagehead in ten seconds flat... or any other head too!
A knife with bent and indented edge, all rusty and bloodstained. You don`t want know who used it and how
Le jouet préféré des pillards sadiques.
An outstanding knife of high quality steel, still sharp even after all these years. Indispensable in a close range battle
A unique combat knife with a wavy edge made of durable steel. Sharp like a razor !
Un déchet... Mais toujours mieux qu'une batte simple.
A huge broad blade from Zebra Empire. Useful for chopping through dense vegetation or slicing and dicing enemies
A heavy machete, decorated with ornament and encrusted with nephrite
A heavy pipe with a massive nut on one side. Those who meet this in a battle quickly learn to keep away
Electrical saw, working on batteries. Can cut relatively fragile materials, including bones and skulls. Way less effective against metal
A unique modified ripper. Unlike the common one, this has teeth of special steel, which makes it easy to cut through not that strong armor
Spinning edges of this tool are enchanted so that it can easily cut all sorts of metal garbage. Quite as easily it cuts metal armor, with its owner inside. Consumes Spark-batteries
Once it was used to cut down trees, now, as there are no trees left, one can use it to cut enemies to pieces. Magically-enhanced teeth can handle even the sturdiest material. Consumes Spark-batteries
Once it was an instrument for earthwork, but sharpened edge converted it into a weapon
A heavy iron machinery part, welded to a sturdy long rod. A good swing - and it can easily add a couple of holes to somepony`s head
A good tool for crushing walls as well as enemy skulls
A sledgehammer turned into a deadly weapon. A prolonged handle is made of sturdiest oak and reinforced with iron, and head is ribbed for dealing higher damage
This huge axe comes in handy for cutting through enemy crowds
This sword was an attribute of every zebra centurion or higher officer during wartime. It was more a proof of status than a combat weapon though
Obviously this zebra sword belonged to some big fish. You can tell that by gold decorations on the guard and zebra glyphs on the blade which, unfortunately, you can`t read
A common zebra sword at the first glance, but one can notice little lightnings dancing around on a surface of the blade. Which is unusual to say the least
A unique electric sword that once belonged to a legate of the Zebra legion
Compact weapon, combining the advantages of melee and magical energy weapons. Inflicts plasma damage
A long dagger made from a claw of the hellhound leader you defeated. This claw is stronger than steel and sharper than the best combat knife
Very effective melee weapon, but it requires quite some experience using it
This unique sword is not made of usual steel but of metal of unknown origin. Its edge almost never get blunt and can cut through enemy armor like through cardboard
May the Force be with You, young Padawan!
A more powerful energy sword glowing with golden light
A high-tech weapon, equipped with an inertial accumulator, capable of storing kinetic energy. Being released on impact, it greatly increases power of the strike
A specially weighted super sledge, clearly made for somepony big and strong. Scary even to think, what damage one strike of this can cause
A tungsten tip, feeding from an "infinite" power source, can get several thousand degrees hot and burn through flesh and armor like a small but angry Celestia`s sun

This thing only looks like a spear. In reality it is a complex fusion of magic and technology - magical energy melee weapon, causing a tremendous plasma damage and not requiring changing batteries for exploitation
A unique magical spear, blade emitting cold moonlight and vibrating slightly from force hidden inside. Hard to tell what magic was used to create it, but one should respect it, or even better - fear
A magical weapon from the zebras` land, possessing an ominous and unstoppable power. It is capable of cutting those invisible threads that bind souls to bodies of living beings, ignoring any armor
Actually it is not a sword at all but a sharpened metal part of some mechanism, strapped to a stick
Old-fashioned and not very effective firearm, dealing little damage and having low rate of fire
The most common pistol produced before the War for civilian needs
A standard, commonly used pistol using 10mm ammo. Its advantages are simplicity of design, reliability and low cost
A unique 10-mm pistol, clearly made by some talented craftspony. It has a set of essential modifications and its stats are much higher than those of a standard model
A slightly modified 10-mm gun, equipped with a sound suppressor. Makes less noise when shooting, but also does less damage
The simplest example of magical energy weapon shooting red laser beams. Low power is compensated by low energy consumption comparing to rifles
A unique laser pistol, likely created after the War. It has a more powerful and capacious battery, and there is an inscription in a red paint saying "OBEY"!
Even though you can not call this a weapon in a normal sense, it can ignite enemy, causing him quite a bit of discomfort
The plasma pistol is much more powerful than laser one, but less accurate and faster consumes battery charge
A unique plasma pistol, perfected by a master-armorer. At least he could somehow fix the characteristic flaws of this weapon type, such as low accuracy and fast battery drain
The pulse pistol is called so because shooting it emits powerful directed electromagnetic pulses. They are capable of damaging electronic circuits of robots, but cause almost no harm to living beings
Quite a primitive weapon, sending electrical discharges on target. It was not designed for a battle but rather for paralyzing troublemakers and criminals

An example of magical energy weaponry requiring no ammo. It takes energy for shooting from an "infinite" self-charging spark-battery. However it comes with a price of lower damaging power and poor combat qualities
Old, but powerful and reliable revolver, although recharging it may cause some difficulty
Large-caliber revolver equipped with an optical sight. It possesses huge destructive power and good accuracy, but uses a rare type of .44 caliber ammo
A unique all-purpose .44 caliber revolver made by Ironshod Firearms exclusively for Applejack. Its white ivory handle has a picture of three red apples on it
A pistol converted by unknown craftspony from a 0.308 caliber rifle. It resulted in a compact, fast and deadly weapon
Large-caliber gun going with impressive destructive power, monstrous recoil and deafening "Boom!". Using cartridges with special blunt-ended bullets that strike like a hoof kick of doom
This pistol is named so for a reason. Its shots are like sledge strikes. Hard to tell how it works, looks like some special earth pony magic

Converted from a 12.7-mm pistol, this model is designed for a powerful cartridge of 50 MG caliber. Its lethal force is really terrifying, being only slightly inferior to a large-caliber rifle. At the same time, it has a much smaller size and a decent rate of fire, but it pays with a rather low accuracy
Modification of the "Terrifying" gun. Its elongated barrel allows increased accuracy and strength of the shot, and corpus, covered with black varnish, looks so very impressive

A weapon, unique and unusual in all respects. They say it was created not by a pony but fell from the stars. The destructive power of its shots is very high, and there is no defense against it, but there is a problem with ammunition - the star blaster uses only special energy cells that are extremely difficult to find
A unique gun belonging to Brass Buckshot
Submachine gun, using common 9-mm ammo. Small, cheap, effective and does not require special skills
A compact and effective weapon, and unlike a bulky assault rifle is ideal for indoor use
Heavy large-caliber submachine gun. Deals some nice damage and knocks-back enemies, but uses scarce type of ammo
This specimen differs significantly from the standard 12.7 mm SMG model. Thanks to some design features, it had reduced the spread of a shot and increased aiming range
All-purpose firearm that combines ease of use, good firepower and abundant ammo type
An upgraded model of an assault rifle. They say only several hundreds were produced by the end of the Great War, thus now they are super rare
Next generation of weaponry compared to assault rifles. This one is more compact, precise and effective
Modified assault rifle with upgraded optics and increased magazine. A dream of every gun nut
Equipped with a silencer and optical sight. Bullets fired from it are enchanted to ignite on impact with a target. Always fires three bullets per a pull of trigger
An improved zebra rifle owned by Centurion Upanga. It is enchanted with a much stronger fire spell than usual. It is clearly a work of an experienced shaman
High fire rate laser rifle, emitting magical rays of violet color. Fires three rounds per a pull of trigger
A unique sparkle-automatic, creator of which was able to increase fire rate by adding magical cooling system. It also has a built-in audio player, but it doesn`t work
Weapon of devastating power, sending a rain of scorching plasma on your enemies
A unique plasma caster with a special spellmatrix. Its plasma blasts have a chance to hit through armor, which makes this weapon much more insidious and dangerous
A standard weapon of Great Pegasus Enclave forces. It represents latest developments of magical energy technologies
Improved version of the Novasurge rifle, more powerful and more reliable than usual. It is only given to commanders of the Enclave special forces
Very effective, powerful and high fire rate weapon, but it requires a lot of experience using it
Improved version of a light machine gun, a bit more powerful and more accurate than a common one. It belonged to Elder Coldsight before
This weapon is a hybrid of a rifle and a light machine gun. It is very precise, and at the same time sufficiently rapid to sustain an reasonable fire rate

The antiair machine gun, converted into a personal weapon, once indeed developed especially for fighting dragons. It is so heavy that only the strongest earth pony would be able to use it, or perhaps a unicorn with perfect telekinetic skills
A unique 14.5 mm machine gun, converted into a personal weapon by griffins. Once belonged to one of the "Talons" detachments
A large-caliber machine gun, intended primarily for reinforcing guard posts rather than for personal use. Too big and heavy, but its firepower is more than impressive

A model of a plasma gun, modified just before the Apocalypse, which combat characteristics were much improved. As far as we know, only a few dozen units were produced, after which the manufacturing plant was destroyed by a megaspell

A unique high fire rate plasma caster, which design was improved by an unknown master. It seems, it hid in the storerooms of the "Steel Rangers" for years, waiting for something. And now its time has come
This ancient shotgun is all rusty and falling apart. It can still shoot alright, but success is unlikely. Can hold two shells maximum
A vintage shotgun in a good condition. You can tell, somepony really cared for this weapon and yet almost never used it
A lever-action rifle, sawed-off and converted to a shotgun. Effective for a close range combat only

Double-barreled sawed-off shotgun. Quite powerful, but because of a widespread of shot, it is effective only at close range. Allows only two shots to be fired, then you have to reload. Which, of course is not very convenient
A unique sawed-off shotgun that probably belonged to some sheriff. There is a name on a butt of the rifle. Silverstar
Semi-automatic shotgun with a drum magazine, one of many weapon models developed in Ironshod Firearms
A modified shotgun with loner barrel and improved cartridge feeding system, making it faster and more accurate
A shotgun used by pre-War police forces, becoming very popular nowadays due to its combat effectiveness
A unique police shotgun of outstanding quality, clearly made by special order. There is an engraving saying "To police chief Counterstrike, in gratitude for saving hostages"
Similar to a laser rifle, but using different focusing system. Instead of a single impulse it emits a bunch of rays of different wavelength, that makes it more effective at close range
A modified prism gun, has a higher power than a standard model. Its rainbow colored rays can burn a target through and knock it back at the same time
A unique weapon, the only one in existence. It does not melt or incinerate, but freezes the target. The living creatures are particularly vulnerable to this effect
Magical energy shotgun casting three plasma bolts per one shot. Weapon of choice at close range, not effective at long distance
A unique plasma shotgun, augmented by some dark magic. First, it emits plasma of pinkish color, second - it now causes much more damage
A weathered, slightly rusty rifle that, surprisingly, still works. Even though it became obsolete long before the War, it can still make a few holes in somepony
This weapon is as old as the Equestrian firearms can be. But it was made to last, and it still surpasses many similar rifles
Do not even ask why ponies might need hunting rifles. Just a good and accurate weapon, besides consuming a common ammo type
A lever-action rifle, slightly primitive perhaps, but accurate and reliable. It was quite popular before the War among civilians of Equestria, regarded as an outstanding self-defense weapon
"And what are You ready to sacrifice for freedom?" - asks the cowpony from an old propaganda poster, holding a rifle exactly like this in her hooves
Effective long-range weapon. Uses rare .308 caliber ammo
A unique sniper rifle. It is completely black, and its butt has hundreds of tiny notches. Its previous owner counted its every prey
One of the most powerful examples of non-military weapons. A shot from this rifle can even kill a bear, and from a reasonable distance too
Can you really kill an elephant with this? Well, we will never know for sure due to an absence of elephants in the Equestrian Wasteland. But judging by its looks - you most probably can
Large-caliber armor-piercing rifle effective against robots and power armor. With some luck you can even take out a tank. The bad news is that it is not so easy to find proper ammunition
A unique anti-machine rifle, enchanted to shoot without any recoil, even though its power is simply monstrous. Decorated with gold and precious stones, and every shot sounds like a thunder roll

This weapon represents an attempt to create a weapon that doesn`t require any ammo. Not very successful, as you can see. An "infinite" battery does not produce enough power, and the weapon itself requires frequent maintenance

A more powerful and accurate weapon than a laser pistol, but also faster consuming battery power. Unlike bullets, a laser beam instantly reaches destination, hence no need to make any corrections for target distance and some other factors. Doesn`t work underwater
Limited edition laser rifle that uses magical ruby of a very rare kind as a focusing crystal. During the War, it was used by elite pegasi-assaulters, but now it is almost impossible to get

High-power magical energy weapon casting bolts of green magical plasma. When shot from this gun, enemies do not just die but actually melt into a puddle of green slime. Can easily melt through concrete walls, but because of difficulties with plasma stabilization it is not highly accurate and requires good skills for successful exploitation
An example of how much one can improve combat stats of a standard weapon with proper talent and ingenuity. This modified plasma rifle not only has higher fire rate, but also uses less energy

A significantly enhanced version of the pulse pistol. To create the most powerful electromagnetic pulse, it is stuffed with a whole bunch of coils, capacitors, and lamps. Unfortunately, all this stuff is very unreliable and wears down quickly
The impulse rifle of a very strange look. The blue crystals inserted in it emit a magical aura, which must have something to do with its increased fire rate
This weapon is more powerful and accurate in comparison to a common laser rifle, but consumes battery charge faster. Also it emits rays of green color instead of red

A long-range laser rifle made by special order, probably even unique. Higher quality capacitors and the finest tuning of focusing crystals makes this weapon able to generate laser impulses of unbelievable power!

A weapon emitting an intense flow of infrared radiation, instantly igniting the target. It was developed as an alternative to flamethrowers, but, unlike them, does not have such a demoralizing effect, and therefore has not become too popular
The unique thermoemitter, which fighting qualities are an order of magnitude higher compared to a usual one. Capable of turning anything into ashes
Long range magical energy rifle. Hits enemy with a powerful bolt of electricity, targeted by a laser ray. For better effect target must be touching the ground
A unique storm rifle, which coolness is OVER NINE THOUSAND! It is not only more powerful than ordinary storm rifles, but is also enchanted to pierce magical armor

This gun uses electro-magnetic field for bullet acceleration. This way bullets reach much higher speed than when shot using gunpowder. Although shooting bullets, it belongs to magical energy weapons and consumes spark-batteries
An improved railgun, developed not so long ago by what is left from Equestrian science. Even more deadly than before, and also equipped with improved power system
Single charge 40-mm grenade launcher, effective both against crowds of enemies as well as for punching through walls. Projectiles move in a parabolic trajectory, that must be considered when aiming
Automatic 40-mm grenade launcher, much more effective than an ordinary single charge one, as it allows to keep up intense fire. Steel Rangers are quite fond of this weapon for its deadly power
Unique automatic grenade launcher, capable of turning a battlefield into a burning hell. It has a bigger magazine and faster fire-rate, compared to a standard model
A 40-mm grenade launcher with a large magazine for 12 shells and an excellent fire rate. Provides the highest density of fire among all weapons of this type
A portable launcher designed for destruction of heavy machinery, buildings and enemy horsepower using large-caliber rockets
A missile launcher with enhanced combat characteristics and laser guidance, which provides greater accuracy

Weapon equipped with rotating several barreled cluster of impressive firepower. It uses small-caliber ammo, which is not very effective against armored targets. In addition, it takes some time to start spinning
A unique minigun - machine of doom, a horrible meat grinder. Just a word that Gale appeared on a battlefield may cause enemy troops run in panic
Multiple barreled laser gun, which gives you great power and rate of fire but is too large and heavy
Unique laser minigun that belonged to some high-ranking Steel Ranger. More precise and compact than standard model

A weapon of unbelievable power, capable of turning a whole squad into a puddle of green goo in a matter of seconds. Its huge size, weight and charge consumption on the other hoof make it a poor personal weapon

Somepony could indeed find significance in dragon`s breath and flow of plasma spit by this weapon. But it would be right to say, that facing this weapon, a dragon would definitely wind himself in trouble
Incinère les ennemis. A une chance de mettre la cible en feu, Cause plus de dégats avec le temp
An improved flamethrower, having some construction changes. Because of those, fire range and fuel burning temperature are increased
An explosive flame-thrower, launching small portions of combustible mixture. Balls of fire explode on impact, splashing burning fuel all over, so remember to keep distance
A fearsome weapon, promising inevitable and very painful death, causing panic and chaos in enemy squads. It spits burning fuel on long distance, starting fires that are quite hard to extinguish
A tactical flamethrower of respectable looks, all black from soot. Once it belonged to a notorious chief of Scorchers raider gang, who died in a fire in his own lair
There is nothing special about the weapon itself, it is a simple launcher. Its ammunition on the other hoof, balefire eggs, conceal fantastic destructive power
Improved balefire Egg Launcher, more accurate, reliable and can maintain higher fire rate. As if this terrible weapon even needed improvement!
Attach a lighter to an aerosol can, and you get an improvised flamethrower! Not that it is of much use though. For burning radroaches maybe
Hoofmade contraption shooting poisoned darts. Darts themselves do little damage and can hardly get through even light armor, but on the bright site - it is completely noiseless
This "weapon" shoots streams of corrosive acid, corrupting armor and causing chemical burns
A cunning contraption, shooting circular saws. Rapidly propelling and spinning saw blades are capable of causing serious damage to several enemies standing in a row
Hard to tell how exactly it works, but it works alright
This hoofmade rifle uses electromagical field to shoot railway spikes with a high speed. To make this you must be a very experienced engineer
This weapon is called so because, after seeing it in your hooves, anypony will be immediately struck with the idea that it is way better to be your friend rather than your enemy
A weapon invented by a genius, yet obviously mad scientist. It is as dangerous for the owner, as for his enemies, as it shoots huge, unstable and explosive balls of plasma
A simple stick of dynamite with a long fuse, more suitable for mining than fighting. Use with care!
A primitive grenade, made of a tin can filled with gunpowder and metal junk. It can be easily created at a workbench
An effective weapon against enemies hiding behind a cover. It looks like a metallic apple
This grenade emits a cloud of toxic gases. Even small amount of it can cause a quick death when inhaled. Especially effective in small and poorly ventilated rooms
A bottle filled with a very corrosive liquid. When smashed, it spills acid everywhere, causing severe chemical burns to whoever steps into it. Effective against robots` armor
Instead of common explosive substances, this grenade uses powerful magic charge that can melt everything! Much more powerful than usual grenades
A grenade using electromagnetic impulse for destroying robots and other electronics. Is not effective against live targets
On explosion, the surrounding air instantly cools down to extremely low temperatures. The living beings receive serious hypothermic damage
A bottle filled with incendiary liquid and plugged with a piece of cloth. Ignite it, throw it - simple, cheap, effective
Exploding, this grenade sets everything on fire
An extremely powerful version of a hoofmade grenade with increased radius of damage. For an explosive it uses an infernal mixture based on Sparkle-Cola RAD
A mine assembled from junk and gunpowder. It operates like an ordinary anti-personnel mine, but not as powerful
Une mine de proximité, équippée d'un système de reconnaissancce allié/ennemi.
Powerful magically-enhanced version of an usual mine
Anti-robot mine, which sensor is calibrated to react only on mechanical enemies. It doesn`t affect live forces
On explosion of this mine, the surrounding air instantly cools down to extremely low temperatures. The living beings receive serious hypothermic damage
A balefire egg, turned into a mine. It is required to be a real explosives master to assemble and use such dangerous devices

This mine is more powerful than usual fragmentation and plasma mines, and because of its camouflage pattern it is more difficult to notice. In addition, zebras often cast a curse on such mines, making them even more dangerous

Small, yet powerful charges of plastic explosives equipped with a radio detonator. You can install several charges and then explode all at the same time by pressing the button. To detonate, press the reload button [R]. Only explosives in the same room will detonate
A couple of dynamite sticks, held together with duct tape. It is more effective for destroying walls, than ordinary dynamite, but doesn`t cause much damage to fortified concrete
Explosives made for destroying fragile walls. More sturdy walls may require a couple of these
It is a very powerful explosive device that can destroy even the sturdiest concrete wall. Useless against steel walls
This spell allows to hit a remote target with a focused telekinetic field, dealing strike damage and knocking it back
One of the basic combat spells, shooting a simple blast of magical energy at the enemy. By the principle of action this spell resembles plasma weapons
This spell launches a blast of sharp icicles, piercing and freezing your enemies
A spell that creates several sharp ghost blades at once, that spread out like a fan
This spell transforms unicorn magic power into a stream of fire, resembling dragon flames, even though, of course, not so devastating
This spell hits enemy with almost a natural lightning! It causes more damage if target touches the ground, but it is not so effective against flying targets
Classics of combat magic. A fiery blast exploding when hitting the target, like a bazooka shot
This spell transforms unicorn magic into radiant energy of devastating power. It is also quite accurate at long range
A very complex spell. Allows launching a special shockwave, similar to one from an explosion, but of directed action. On impact enemies receive heavy internal damage
One of the most powerful spells in mage`s arsenal. Causes much damage and is very effective against crowding enemies, but is very demanding of magical power
A spell that creates the strongest flow of negative energy that kills all life on its way, no matter how far is the distance. Does not work on non-living opponents
The amplified version of the telekinetic bullet, producing 5 telekinetic projectiles simultaneously, causing target impact damage and throwing it back with a huge force
A very powerful spell that allows you to emit streams of stellar energy from which there is no escape
A weapon from the Alicorn`s Armor set. A magically created ghostly halberd, unusually light, sharp and never breaks
A weapon from Alicorn`s Armor set. Similar to small arms by principle of action, though doesn`t require ammunition since bullets are created by magic
A weapon from Alicorn`s Armor set. Similar to plasma weapons, but uses a battery that takes power directly from the armor energy source
A weapon from Alicorn`s Armor set. Rapidly shoots dozens of magic shells that explode upon contact with a target
A battle spell embedded in Alicorn`s armor. Creates bursts of destructive cosmic energy

armor.info: Common clothing worn by all stable dwellers
Stable jumpsuit strengthened with armor plates. It gives little protection, but it`s better than nothing
Suit for use in areas with high background radiation. It has built-in air filters. It also allows to breathe underwater

Rubber suit, designed for use in the aggressive environment. Usually gives you full protection against any toxic and corrosive substances, but this one seems to have some dried-up seals in several places, so now the protection is not perfect. Also allows to breathe underwater
Armor sewn with thick hides of Wasteland monsters. It gives good protection against most types of damage, especially against flames, but does not stop bullets very well
Hoofmade armor, consisting of roughly fastened metal plates. Although it protects well against bullets, it is very heavy and constrains movements

Armor of excellent quality based on plates of complex polymers and ceramics. Designed to provide the good ballistic protection, while having relatively low weight and not constraining movements of the user
Improved combat armor designed especially for elite stormtroopers. Provides the best protection among all armor types, except power armor
Special armor, charmed to counteract effects of magical energy. Provides little protection against bullets and normal physical attacks
An armor designed especially for battle mages. Built-in talismans not only protect from magical energy impact, but also increase you own spell power

A light and sturdy armor made of thick chitinous radscorpion shells. Can be greatly improved by experienced hoofs. Gives a good protection against physical attacks, protects against monster fangs, but poorly protects against bullets and magic

A light armor designed for scouts and saboteurs. Its camouflage color allows you to merge with terrain and act stealthily. It also confuses enemies during battle, preventing them from taking steady aim

Unique armor with integrated active camouflage system. This system is similar in principle to the StealthBuck, but can be used an unlimited number of times, just taking some time to recharge. Press @1 or @2 to activate
Heavy but sturdy armor, equipped with a special amortizing lining, a refractory outer layer and a closed helmet. Excellent protection against hits, fire and explosions
While you are wearing these clothes, each enemy you kill may drop a precious stone (the stronger the opponent, the more likely)
Tant que tu portes ce "costume", les pillards, les esclavagistes et les mercenaires ne t'attaquerons pas à moins que tu les provoque.

This power armor was created based on the armor of the Steel Rangers, though with multiple modifications and simplifications - the helmet was converted for use by a unicorn, some armored plates removed, most of the internal mechanisms are missing. It has impressive protective qualities, but heavy weight greatly limits mobility
Armor for law enforcement officers, designed almost at the very end of the War from military combat armor. The armor plates in it are replaced by multilayer aramid fiber
Multipurpose armor for special forces operatives. Provides protection from a wide range of damage types, suitable for any situation
Modified power armor of the Pegasus Enclave. It is much lighter compared to the Steel Rangers` power armor and designed to protect more against magic than against physical damage
The exoskeleton is all that remains of the Alicorn`s Armor. It no longer gives magical enhancements, but is still quite light and sturdy, and most importantly - it allows you to fly!
An amulet made from a soldier`s dog tag, which has a deep dent from the bullet. Apparently, the dog tag stopped the bullet, thereby saving the life of its owner
An amulet, skillfully made from a variety of wires, screws and gears, making a fascinating composition
An amulet made from a non-triggered detonator of an anti-personnel mine, endowed with almost imperceptible magic
An amulet made of a canine of some large predator and decorated with feathers. Its magic should protect against wild beasts and monsters
A magical amulet made of fiery agate. Helps resisting heat and fire
A powerful amulet created by a great wizard. Protects owner from hostile magic
Amulet created by zebras with their mysterious and sinister magic. Improves stealth and evasion of the owner
Amulet designed for Pegasi dealing with thunderclouds. Very good protection against lightnings
Amulet of polished bone, protecting from black magic
Amulet made of a shiny metal plate with the sign of the Steel Rangers
This amulet has seen many great battles. Its mysterious power protects owner from physical damage
An amulet made from a cracked optical sight lens, definitely possessing some kind of magic
A wooden amulet covered with elaborate carvings and stained with dried blood. Inscription on the back side says "What is dead may never die"
A fragment of a dark crystal with a faint spark of magic glowing deep inside

item.n: Schematics for the Saw blade launcher.

item.info: A low-power pistol ammo, quite cheap because of its low efficiency
Widely-used handgun ammo, easily obtained in the Wasteland
Pistol rounds "HnH Magnum", used in some revolvers and rifles
"Magnum" rounds - heavier, more expensive and rare than other handgun ammunition
Handgun ammo produced in large quantities long before the War
Common sniper rifle rounds
Great and powerful handgun rounds, very effective, but rare and expensive
Large-caliber bullet with a steel tip - one of the most rare, expensive and effective kinds
Common assault rifle rounds, widely-used by both armies during the War
Small-caliber rounds used in high fire-rate weapons, when quantity means more than quality
Ammunition that contains buckshot instead of bullets, used for shotguns
A modern and more effective shotgun shell
A very large caliber ammo designed for heavy machine guns
Flammable liquid used in flamethrowers
Compact Spark-battery of medium power used in magical energy weaponry
Standard Spark-battery used in most models of magical energy weapons
Energy cell of increased power based on rare crystals. Used as a power supply in the most deadliest magical energy weapons
A small explosive projectile for use in grenade launchers
A self-propelled projectile for use in rocket launchers
A magical projectile, resembling an egg. Destructive energy, hidden deep inside, is expressed on a surface merely by elusive flickering of lights
A cylinder of liquid propane and isobutane - highly flammable gases
A common attribute for a darts game
A circular saw of stainless steel with sharp teeth
A plastic bottle with concentrated acid
A heavy iron thing, used to attach sleepers to rails
If the alchemical compounds contained in this small cell react, this would cause an instant drop in their temperature to the almost absolute zero
A battery used for a star blaster, many times more powerful than usual batteries
Bottle caps used as money
The substance used by Auto-Doc as an expendable material for treating injuries and wounds
Suitable for treatment of scratches and cuts and also stops bleeding
Intended for treatment of light injuries. Treatment effect takes some time
Intended for treatment of injuries of medium severity. Treatment effect takes some time
Intended for treatment of severe injuries. Treatment effect takes some time
Restores magical power and heals magical burnout and exhaustion
Restores magical power and heals magical burnout and exhaustion
Restores magical power and heals magical burnout and exhaustion
Clears body of magical radiation
Instantly neutralizes effects of any kind of toxins and increases poison resistance for a short time
Permanently increases maximum health
item.mess: This is not an ordinary healing potion, but a potent elixir that can permanently fortify your health. Drink it without hesitation

item.info: Permanently increases the maximum of magical power
Portable techno-magical device developed by the Ministry of Arcane Sciences with support from the Ministry of Image, capable to make his owner invisible for a short period of time
Can be used to repair almost any weapon. Using this, you can repair an equipped weapon by some degree depending on the weapon class and your repair skill
Using a portable bench you can repair your weapons and armor on a march, just like using a regular workbench
Contains all the necessary equipment for creating explosives on a march
Contains all the necessary equipment for preparing potions and chemicals in the field
Needed to call or dismiss a tamed phoenix
A small security robot that can also serve as a personal assistant or secretary. Has a fairly powerful laser weapon. Can be used as a companion
item.mess: You assembled a [robo-owl], and now it can be your companion. Activate it through the inventory - the [equipment] section. There you can see the robo-owl condition and its stats. If the robo-owl is damaged in combat, you can repair it in the same way as any weapon or armor

item.info: This magical item contains recorded memories of other creatures. Using it brings you an additional skill point
item.mess: You have found a memory orb - a magical repository of memories that contains important information, someone`s valuable experience, or just moments of the past that someone wanted to save. Using it, you will get an additional skill point
You have found a book in good condition, containing useful knowledge. Be sure to read it - from books you can learn a lot of useful things, thereby increasing one of your skills

item.info: Collection of medical supplies necessary to treat light wounds and injuries. Basic medical skills are required to use this item
A set of medical instruments needed for mending fractured bones and other serious injuries. Advanced medical skills are required to use this item

Contains complex medical tools and healing spells for treating the most severe wounds. One can literally bring somepony back to life with this, providing he has the most advanced medical skills and lots of experience
A pack of artificial blood, compatible with blood of any pony race

A substance in capsules of yellow and red colors, temporarily increasing radiation resistance. Recommended when working in places with high magical radiation background. Use one capsule per individual
Drugs in a form of peppermint-flavored candy. Temporarily gives you a boost to intelligence and clear thinking, and also sharpens your senses, but has reverse, negative after effects
Improved version of Mint-als, giving much more prominent effect. Incredibly boosts brain capabilities and sharpness of perception. Effect doesn`t add up with that of common Mint-als
A powerful military stimulator, that gives you a feeling of time being slowed down. Increases speed and gives additional action points in S.A.T.S.
An advanced version of the dash, makes user fast as a lightning. True, there is some probability of sudden death from a heart attack. Does not add up with the effect of an ordinary dash
A drug developed and manufactured during the Great War in order to increase soldiers` courage and aggressiveness. Makes user feel unstoppable rage, resulting in higher amount of damage being caused
A potent pain-killer for intravenous injection. For a short time makes you completely mute to pain, which is sometimes used to increase soldiers` effectiveness in combat

A drug that combines effects of Rage and Med-X. It makes one feel unstoppable rage while simultaneously suppressing any pain and self-protection instinct, making him or her very dangerous and deadly. Not compatible with common Rage or Med-X
Steroid drug in form of green pills, used to increase physical strength and endurance. Starts working immediately, although only for a short period of time

Healing potion of unmatched effectiveness, formulated with essence of an actual hydra. Speeds up living tissue regeneration by up to a hundred times, mending any injuries, but it is also dangerous because of possible mutagenic side effects
Rare and valuable medicine used to treat chemical addiction. Instantly removes all drug effects, both positive and negative, and also neutralizes poison
Instantly restores health. Even though it is capable of saving life in a critical condition, it is very toxic
This potion gives you wings, thus making you able to fly. The effect is temporary

Drinking the potion will turn you into a shadow. While in this form, it is hard to see or cause damage to you, but you won`t be able to fight as well. Also, it seems that it weakens unicorns` telekinesis ability
The potion reduces magical energy consumption for telekinesis and different spells, increasing their power, and also speeds up energy restoration
For a short period of time allows you seeing through walls and also to see things that are hidden or concealed with magic
For five minutes allows you to breathe underwater and swim much faster
This potion somewhat protects you from the harmful effects of the Pink Cloud
If during its action you are dealt a death blow, you gain absolute protection for 5 seconds and partially restore your health. Absolute protection does not save from poison and bleeding
Smokable. The effect is unpredictable!
This potion makes your bones sturdy and capable to endure heavy load. Permanent effect
Drinking this improves your ability to resist different negative factors, such as poisoning, bleeding and radiation. Permanent effect
This potion improves your reflexes and increases aggression. You can deal more damage with melee weapons. Permanent effect
This potion increases running speed and stamina capacity. In other words you can run faster and longer. Permanent effect
This potion fortifies your nervous system and sharpens sight, which improves your shooting accuracy. Permanent effect
This potion gives you an ability to anticipate the near future to some extent, and thus evade enemy bullets. Permanent effect
It is hard to say what exactly this potion does and how it works, but with it your hits will cause critical damage more often. Permanent effect
A potion invented by unicorns in the distant past. Strengthens magician`s connection to natural forces and increases power of his spells
Purifies from curses
The most popular alcohol-free fizzy beverage with carrot flavor. Speeds up restoration of magical energy
Non-alcoholic fizzy drink produced before the War. Restores health
It is extremely not recommended eating this thing. But perhaps there is somepony who might like it
A rare kind of Sparkle-Cola, which contains radioactive substances. Has a radish taste and glows in the dark
Tasty and healthy drink with a light stimulating effect
Lat de brahmine frais, retire les radiations
Low-alcoholic beverage made from local oats. The taste is not so great
Low-alcohol beverage from potatoes. The taste leaves much to be desired
Alcoholic drink of medium strength from local fruits, or whatever is now used instead of them. Pretty pleasant to the taste
A fairly strong alcoholic beverage obtained by distillation
An hard draft with a scent of fusel oil. For those who simply want to get wasted
Almost pure alcohol, rare and quite expensive
Cider of the highest quality with a delicate taste and aroma
Rare rose wine for real esthetes
In addition to apples, the composition of this liqueur includes a dozen different kinds of fruits
A popular brand of whiskey before the War, currently 200-year-old!
Vodka of elite quality, worth a lot of money before the War. Purified with magic crystals!
They say that over the past time this tincture has acquired an absolutely unique taste
"Healing" liqueur made from apples, 24 kinds of herbs and medical alcohol
You can pour in hot water, or just eat it dry
You can cook something with it, or just chew it as it is
Pretty tasty, sweet and nutritious
An incomprehensible gray mass with even more incomprehensible bits of something, perhaps dried vegetables
Food rich in vegetable protein
Relatively fresh bread, baked no more than a week ago
You can eat it as is, but it`s better when cooked
Pre-war potato chips with the taste of spicy horseradish
Crackers with the taste of sorrel, so dry that one could use them to make sparks for a bonfire
A mixture of nuts in a bag, who knows how preserved from pre-war times
Sweet corn flakes shaped like air bombs
Pre-war delicacy, delicious sweet and sour sweets
Delicacy from the land of zebras
Sweet mass made of ground peanuts
Honey can be stored for hundreds of years, but fresh honey is lost, probably, forever
A real apple grown on the surface
Mushroom of questionable edibility
Sweet and crisp root
Bitter vegetable, used in many dishes
Delicious vegetable of a slightly sour taste
Green watery vegetable
Juicy and fibrous vegetable
Fresh butter from a local farm
Fresh cheese, looks and smells good
Looks more like an egg of some reptile than bird
It is not recommended to eat raw meat
Nutritious tubers, usually used in cooked form
The main ingredient of any pastry
A very spicy and odorous vegetable, used as a seasoning and as a chemical weapon
Sugar is no longer produced, so its strategic reserves are very valuable
Tomato sauce with many spices and preservatives
It is said that meat increases aggression
Simple snack
Simple yet delicious dinner
Simple but nutritious and healthy food
It is important not to simply cut and mix vegetables, but to do it in a correct order
Very nourishing and delicious lunch
The traditional food of Wasteland wanderers. Any eggs are suitable for making it
Common humble breakfast
The main principle of this dish is to mix everything in one pan and cook it
While this dish may look simple, its preparation has a lot of nuances
By the Wasteland standards this is a rich dish
A very tasty vegetable casserole with crispy cheese crust
This recipe was invented after the war, when meat began to be consumed in large quantities
Mixing, at the first glance, incompatible ingredients, we get a completely unexpected taste
An old, well known in the past recipe for hoofmade pies
Everypony`s favorite tea time pastries
Nowadays it is not so easy to get the right ingredients for the traditional apple pie. But it`s totally worth it
The filling of this pie consists of meat and vegetables. It is very nutritious, and if you eat it for breakfast, you are sated until evening
This pie includes almost everything sweet that can be found it the Wasteland. Extreme dose of sugar
A cake with a very strange filling, for true lovers of Wasteland culinary
A type of soup of a very complex composition. Only an experienced chef can cook it properly
Pre-War bits, not widely used these days, but can be exchanged for caps
Gems are still valued highly these days. You can sell it for a good price
Gems are still valued highly these days. You can sell it for a good price
Gems are still valued highly these days. You can sell it for a good price
Information downloaded from the terminal contains long forgotten secrets of the past. You can sell it for a good price
Data on pre-War technologies is on high demand among certain communities

item.n: Disc of the Min. of Image
item.info: This disc contains information about the development of the StealthBuck M2. Perhaps Steel Rangers will find it interesting
Undamaged pre-War books - a true rarity nowadays. Most merchants will gladly pay for them
The burglar rune can open any lock, even a stuck one. Single use. To activate, hover cursor over a door or container with a tough lock and press @1
The rune of return teleports you to the base camp from anywhere (confirm action by pressing the button). You can return to the nearest MAS terminal. One-time use
A single use device used to do a deep reboot of the terminal resetting all passwords. It was hard to get even before the War, not to mention now. To use, hover over a secure terminal and press @1
Despite its name, this book can tell you not only about fixing toasters, but actually about repairing anything - from household equipment to modern weapons
In this book you can find interesting and fun facts about medicine, first aid, treating wounds and even basics of surgery
This book has detailed and well-illustrated descriptions of locks of different types and much advice on how to break them. An author definitely must`ve had problems with the law
A children`s guide, in which author introduces young readers to the basics of information technology, and also shares different less known facts about terminals and other electronic systems
A book sponsored by the Ministry of Morale. It contains guidelines for safe handling of explosive materials used in fireworks and some other devices
Monthly illustrated catalog of firearms. It has detailed information on latest technical achievements and fashion trends in this industry
A book on history of melee weapons. From ancient spears and blades to modern magical energy swords
A book about latest trends on everything concerning development and application of magical energy weapons. Although useful information is quite diluted with pompous speeches and propaganda
A guide for beginner spies and scouts. Despite that the author was obviously a paranoid psycho, the book contains some useful information
This book teaches how to communicate with traders of all sorts, how to barter and get discounts and also recognize some common tricks and ruses
A guide for young unicorns, that is supposed to help them develop their telekinetic strength
This book was written after the War. It tells about different dangers of the Wasteland and ways to deal with them. The author - Ditzy Doo
One of many prewar books, dedicated to unicorn magic. Far from being very clever and scientifically accurate, it still has colorful pictures and lots of practical advices
Although this book tells about true alicorns, such as the princess Celestia, the knowledge contained in it might help you against the Goddesses alicorns
Contains many records of ghoul studies
A piece of paper found on Butch, the head of the slavers` guards
Belonged to Sharp Shooter, the leader of a slavers gang
A note found on one of the griffins in the prison camp
Just a souvenir
The magazine, issued before the War by a society that promoted the idea of ​​turning ponies into cyborgs. It lasted only one year, after which it was banned for moral and ethical reasons
A pack of drawings for some unusual armor. Only specialists can understand them
A huge sapphire spreading a frosty aura
A huge ruby ​​shining with fiery light and radiating heat
A huge emerald, for some reason always wet and smelling like the sea
The device for precise measurements of size
Can cut even a thick iron bar
