A complex device for analyzing parameters of an electrical signal
A whole box of brand-new bolts and screws of all sizes. A dream of any mechanic
A whole box of brand-new nuts and washers of all sizes. A dream of any mechanic
A book telling about movements of celestial bodies
A plastic canister containing a clear viscous liquid. With the necessary knowledge you can turn it into explosive nitroglycerin

This disk contains schematics, wiring diagrams and other information useful for figuring out how equidroids work. Although, frankly, it`s unlikely for one to be able to understand at least some of this without being a certified robotics engineer
A box of cigars illegally imported from the zebra country. Excellent smokes
Excellent pipe of cherry wood. Smoky Pit will be glad to get it
A device for heavy smokers. Perhaps Smoky Pit will like it?
Leaf tobacco for smoking pipes. Perfectly preserved, Smoky Pit will gladly pay for it
The only known cure for this disease
A magical device that cleans water of chemical impurities, microbes and radiation
A compact device that uses Balefire technology to produce an almost unlimited amount of energy
The document is titled "ኽዤዌቇሕችነዥሚኆ፧" - whatever this means. Unfortunately, you don`t speak the zebra language and won`t be able to read this
A powerful talisman, which will serve only an experienced warrior. Increases damage from any weapon by #1
A powerful talisman possessing powers that only a true hero can handle. Increases damage from any weapon by #1
A great talisman, giving its power only to the chosen ones. Increases damage from any weapon by #1
A legendary talisman worthy of only the best of the best. Increases damage from any weapon by #1
Screwdriver is required for lock picking. You will also require pins. If you lack them, you can try to open the lock anyway, but the probability for the lock to get jammed will be much higher
item.mess: A screwdriver! Quite a useful tool. It can help you open simple locks. Try it on some locked chest. If the lock doesn`t yield on the first try - don`t worry, just try again!

item.info: Pins are useful for lock picking. They are used to probe and move springs inside a lock with less risk of breaking and jamming it than if using brutal force. In case of failure, you might break the pin, but you will be able to try again using another one

A premium screwdriver made from the sturdiest titanium alloy should help unscrew even the most rusty bolts. You will also find it useful for opening locks, and your lockpicking skill will increase by #1
A medical device designed to hear sounds coming from internal organs... or the sounds the lock makes during lockpicking. Increases your level of lockpicking by #1
A very useful tool for sharpening weapons. Just always carry it with you and it will increase damage of your piercing and cutting weapons by #1
Old binoculars with scratched lenses, a gift from Calamity
Helps entering the Steel Rangers bunker. One-time use
Allows changing the game difficulty to "very easy" for a single time
Allows changing the game difficulty to "easy" for a single time
Allows changing the game difficulty to "normal" for a single time
Allows changing the game difficulty to "hard" for a single time
Allows changing the game difficulty to "super-hard" for a single time
Opens various locks in the slavers den
Gives access to the ManeTec Department of Special Research
Gives access to the overmare office of stable 88
The key taken from a very strong alicorn in Manehattan, the Blood Moon
The key belonging to the necromancer zebra Mchawi
The key that was kept by Elder Coldsight
Oak Stalwort`s key
The key to some cellar in Canterlot that, according to rumors, is full of treasures. At least you hope so, and that the key is worth it
A key found at the Legion`s headquarters
Key received from the commander of the Enclave base

item.mess: A crowbar is a universal tool. It can be used both as a weapon and for breaking various objects. With it, you can attack enemies, break open doors and break through fragile walls. You can also crack open chests and other containers when lock picking with a screwdriver fails. Both loot from the container and the crowbar itself will receive damage
The self-recharging pistol is a lucky prize. It belongs to a variety of magical energy weapons that does not require batteries. Its charge restores with time by itself
Firearms are weapons that use various types of cartridges for firing. Press @1 to reload

You found a book that describes the telekinetic bullet spell. To use, equip it the same way as an ordinary weapon. The spell does not require ammunition but consumes your magical power. Also, the attacking spell can be used simultaneously with any other weapon by pressing the @1 key

To use a protective spell first equip it from your inventory (section [Weapons] or [Equipment]). After that, you can apply it by pressing the @1 key. You can also assign a protective spell to one of the quick spell slots
The implant is installed and activated. No additional actions required
The module is connected to the PipBuck and activated. No additional actions required

item.info: A secret technology developed as a part of "Cyber-pony" project. Implant reinforces skin with polymer tissue, that raises damage threshold by #1. Implantation cost is included in retail price

A complex and expensive implant that combines advanced magic and nanotechnology. Automatically restores the user`s health by #1 units per second, without requiring additional resources, but no more than #2 of the maximum health
The implant created specifically for war mages. Never lets your magical power reach zero, protects from burnout

A small chip that connects directly to the brain. Improves memory, helps to do mathematical calculations, improves the accuracy of telekinesis. In general, this leads to an increase of Lockpicking skill by #1 and Science by #2
A simple device, connectable to PipBuck. Set for detection of small metal items, it allows you finding lost caps and ammo in the most unexpected places
An advanced module for PipBuck, allows scanning enemies to define strong and weak points. In S.A.T.S. you will see exact information about your enemies` health and armor

A complex device, connectible to PipBuck. During battle defines enemies` weak points not covered by armor and marks them with a laser point. You have a chance to attack in the weak spot, completely ignoring any armor. The chance is higher when using rifles and pistols

A complex techno-magical module for PipBuck, employing illusion magic. Acts as an active camouflage system, making it harder detecting you. In battle it creates illusive noise, distracting enemy`s aim. Increases Stealth and evasion bonus by #1

An addition to medical PipBuck module. It constantly monitors your health, automatically applying medical spells in mortal danger, allowing the owner to survive and keep conscience even when seriously wounded. However it takes a long time to recharge after each use
A complex module for PipBuck allowing you to partially automate the picking of a password. Increases your skill for hacking terminals by #1
Improved laser for a robo-owl, increasing damage by about one third
Strengthened body for the robo-owl, increasing its survivability
Just an empty case without any filling
A small but very powerful processor. Currently connected to your PipBuck, which increases your level of lockpicking and terminal hacking by #1, as well as the number of APs in S.A.T.S. mode by #2
item.mess: In your hooves you hold a masterpiece of the former Equestria technology. A very compact processor a thousand times more superior to the conventional one. Using your knowledge of a PipBuck technician, you connect the cogitator to your PipBuck. Of course, this cannot reveal the whole potential of this technological miracle, but still, with it, your PipBuck starts to work faster and better. Your skill level for opening locks and hacking terminals, as well as the number of APs in the S.A.T.S. mode, are increased

item.info: An extension module for PipBuck increasing its computing power. Increases your level of lockpicking and hacking by #1, as well as the amount of AP in S.A.T.S. by #2
Be Smart! Increases damage from combat spells by #1, also increases the chance of successful lockpicking and terminal hacking
item.mess: You find a figurine of a young lavender unicorn with a crimson and lilac stripes in a dark blue mane and with a cutie mark shaped like a magic star. ["Be Smart!"] - reads the golden inscription at the base of the statuette. You immediately feel an unusual clarity of thought, and your magical power has clearly increased

item.info: Awareness! It was under "E"! Increases accuracy and stealth by #1
item.mess: A beautifully preserved statuette of a bright pink pony, with a mane that looks like cotton candy, just radiating an aura of unrestrained happiness and fun. The inscription at the base is a bit strange: [`Awareness! It was under "E"!`] You are surprised to note that all your feelings magically sharpened

item.info: Be Strong! Increases damage from melee weapons by #1, damage from hoof attacks by #2, and health by #3
item.mess: You find a statue of an orange earth pony with a yellow mane and tail, depicted at the moment when her hind hooves hit the air. It is engraved with the inscription "Be Strong!". Amazingly, now you really feel much stronger

item.info: Be Awesome! Increases damage of all firearms by #1, and the speed of running and swimming by #2
item.mess: A statuette of a sky-blue pegasus, with rainbow mane and tail. She is depicted in a proud pose, with straightened wings and a grin on her face. You see the inscription on the base ["Be awesome!"], and immediately feel... much cooler! In every way

item.info: Be Pleasant! Reduces the prices of merchants by #1 and increases the effectiveness of healing potions by #2
item.mess: A statuette of a yellow pegasus, untouched by time, smiling very sweetly from beneath her pink mane with a gentle look in her eyes. The inscription at the base reads "Be Pleasant!" - and indeed you feel inside the power not to kill, but to heal and save lives

item.info: Be Unwavering! Increases the damage threshold by #1, reduces physical and magical damage by #2
item.mess: A statuette of an amazingly beautiful white unicorn with a carefully combed purple mane. With all its appearance, it radiates confidence and firmness, like diamonds on her cutie mark, and these qualities are immediately transmitted to you. The inscription at the base reads: ["Be Unwavering!"]

item.info: An ancient and mysterious relic, increasing the magical power of the owner but enslaving his mind. Under no circumstances should you wear this amulet around your neck! Although just laying in your bag, it still strengthens your battle spells by #1 and decreases magic consumption by #2
item.mess: Alicorn Amulet! An ancient and mysterious relic, increasing the magical power of the owner but enslaving his mind. You feel a strong desire to immediately put the amulet around your neck, but, realizing the danger of such a rash act, simply put it in your bag. And still, even just being near, the amulet increases your magical power

item.info: The ancient tome written by mighty zebra shamans and containing their forbidden knowledge. But it is not just the dark spells and terrible rituals described in the book that are of interest. The book itself is also an extraordinarily powerful artifact, protecting its owner from black magic and giving the ability to absorb the vital energy from enemies
item.mess: The black book! A tome, written in ancient times by mighty zebra alchemists, containing their forbidden knowledge. You would really like to know what secrets are hidden in this book, but it is written in an unfamiliar language. And perhaps, this is for the best. Having the book with you, you get some protection from black magic, as well as an ability to absorb the vital energy of ponies, zebras, griffins, and alicorns you kill

item.info: This spell enables you to summon a magical barrier in a specific location, absorbing enemy bullets and magical spells. The barrier has limited endurance and time of existence, after which it dissipates. Importantly, it lets your bullets and missiles come through

This spell surrounds you with a protective field, increasing your armor stats. It protects from any external damage, however strong blows, armor-piercing bullets and explosions can overwhelm the shield and cause a somewhat reduced damage. It has limited endurance and existence time
This spell releases all your telekinetic power in one mighty impulse. All enemies around you get knocked back with enormous force and might even get stunned. It is very useful when you are surrounded
This spell uses your telekinetic powers to give you a powerful directed impulse. Can be used for evading attacks in combat or getting to hard-to-reach places
This spell surrounds you with a magic field that slows movements of any hostile objects. Improving "Magic" skill increases a radius of the field
This spell creates a shell around you that looks like a crystal. It absorbs any external damage, consuming magical energy instead of health. To use it, hold down the spell key
The spell summons a spirit moonblade, fighting on your side

Allows you to create a ghost wall impassable for your enemies. The wall has a certain limit of durability and lifetime. It is fully permeable for all inanimate objects, like bullets and shells, and for its creator. The wall cannot be created in doorways and on staircases

The spell uses some of your blood to create an impenetrable magic shield for a few seconds. It gives complete invulnerability to any external damage and can save you at the most critical moment at the cost of some blood loss. It won`t work if you don`t have enough blood
Durable material made of several layers of thick fabric with interlayers of polymer fiber for better ballistic protection. Used for manufacturing light body armor
A material enriched with metallic fiber, able to reflect radiation
A rubber-saturated material, impenetrable for liquid and gaseous substances. Protects well in the aggressive environment
Firm pieces of chemically hardened leather, can be used to enhance and repair leather armor
Hard and shiny metal plate, that not just any bullet can break through. Can be used to repair and enhance metal armor
A plate made of ceramics and complex polymers. Very firm and light, it is used in a modern combat armor
A plate of indistinct material, greatly enhanced by magic. Used in a magic armor
A fragment of a thick and sturdy chitinous shell. With enough skill you can make a decent armor
A plate of composite materials with a special textured surface. Used to repair or improve scout armor
A fragment of one of the greatest achievements of equestrian science and technology. Perhaps, if you collect enough of these parts, you can build a complete set of armor
Aramid is stronger than steel and five times lighter. A multilayer fabric of this material can stop a pistol bullet and is quite fireproof
Still looks like new
A bit rusty, but quite sturdy and sharp
Even after all those years it is still elastic
Essential in any household
Indispensable accessory of any smoker
An empty bottle of Sparkle-cola, or of some other beverage
A container for canned food
Just a pile of metal parts, good for nothing
A small detonator used in grenades
Ordinary gunpowder
A small sensory module, reacts on proximity of specified objects
An ordinary lunchbox from "Stable-Tec"
A kitchen timer shaped as a half of an apple
A mechanism for spraying paint
A substance in shape of yellow crystals, a base for powerful explosives
An elastic part of some device
Electric motor from a broken circular saw
Can glue anything to any surface of any material for good
Organic solvent, obtained from the resin of coniferous trees. Toxic and flammable
Different details that can be used for repair or assembly of new weapons
A Spark-battery used for powering up machinery and equipment. Heavy and not very powerful, yet very long-lasting
A simple device for air compression
A hermetically sealed pan for cooking at high temperature
A device, measuring pressure, equipped with a safety valve
A very powerful one, can hold stuff 200 fold heavier that itself
A compact magical device, allowing to hold small items in air
A large and very pure crystal, used in heavy magical energy machinery for focusing energy flows
It has zero electrical resistance
An element of high capacitance, capable of producing high discharge
A memory module containing 300,000 most used passwords. It can be used to create a device that would help hacking terminals
Old desktop fan, long broken and non-functional
Old desk lamp, long broken and non-functional
Old coffee maker, long broken and non-functional
All sorts of transistors, resistors, diodes, microschemes and other parts
Electronic chip, that can be reprogrammed using necessary equipment and skill
A compact device for generating radio signals of certain frequency and amplitude
Device for scanning surroundings using ultrasonic signals
A low-power laser, that can be used in an automatic target designator
Crystal of complex internal structure, refracting and modifying light
A complex magical device, capable of supporting patient`s life even when he is one hoof in the grave. Can restart a stopped heart
Block controlling movement of a robot
Full of very dangerous poison
Can be obtained from acidic slime
A muddy brownish liquid, that substitutes ghouls blood
Glows in the dark with ominous poisonous-green light
Wing membrane of a huge bloodwing
A fang of a bloodwing, containing liquid, preventing blood from coagulating
Resembles an ordinary insect wing, but of enormous size
Faceted eye, sparkling with all colors of the rainbow
Eww gross!
Looks like a giant worm
In a desperate case can be a substitute for machine oil
Some ponies consider this smelly substance good for health
Gives some creatures the ability to breath fire. You can feel a powerful magic contained inside
All sorts of plants having magical properties, necessary for most potions. It is hard to find them in the Wasteland, although some zebra earn their living by gathering these for sale
A multipurpose remedy for every life situation, used in hundreds recipes
Crystallized magical essence
Slime which absorbed the concentrated Pink cloud
Ephemeral substance left after destruction of a necrosprites swarm
A horn of a very strong Canterlot ghoul

A substance of magical nature. On contact with a living material it causes horrible mutations, but in precisely selected doses and in combination with other reagents may cause advantageous alterations
An incredibly potent magical reagent. When properly used, it helps to wake up hidden potential of the body
Pretty versicolored liquid with a horrible taste. Has prominent magical properties
Sparkling silvery dust, that might be found in places of meteorite landing
A rare opaque mineral of blue-white color. According to beliefs, it has a connection to ancient mystical forces
Actually, nopony knows what it is exactly, but not a single really powerful potion is possible without it
An orange crystal resembling a tongue of flame. And even warm to the touch
Very rare alchemical reagent
It appears to be materialized dark magic
A particularly long and sharp claw once belonging to a large hellhound. You can use it to make a weapon or sell it for a good price
A pouch made of thick tarpaulin of a special design by Brass Buckshot. With this you can carry more ammo, batteries or explosives without any loss of mobility
A durable synthetic fabric pouch designed by Steel Rangers specialists. With this you can carry more ammo, batteries or explosives without constraining your movements
An incredibly rare elixir, the recipe of which seems to be lost forever. Enhances the magical talent making unicorns capable of holding more spells in memory at the same time. The effect is permanent
A blue crystal of irregular shape. Its purpose is unknown
Makes horsgregation using magnetic resonance - you don`t have to be a scientist to understand that
Much more powerful than common quadruponificator. A real breakthrough in a world of quadruponification!
Neighralyzes whatever you want and any way you like - this device has so much better capabilities compared to its analogues
It can glow in different colors or rectify electric current - depending on the state of the quantum field
The most important thing to remember when working with this device - where does that plug goes into. Incorrect plugging may cause dire consequences
Power armor for pegasi. You will not be able to wear it properly without some modifications

Dear Reader! If you hold this opus in your hooves, that means that you have decided to take the first step in mastering the subtle art of foul language. The ability to swear firmly and ornately is actually an important and essential part of intelligent speech, and there is absolutely nothing shameful in it if used properly. In most cases, simply adding a dirty word to your speech is not enough to impress audience and fully express your feelings, and many improve their skills of conveying emotions colorfully throughout entire live. Sadly, our dictionary will unlikely be enough to raise you to the level of real maestros of this art, because the truly masterful swearing should come intuitively and from your very heart. But thanks to this book, you can definitely get a starting point that will guide you in further improving your talents in this field
Turns you into a small animal for a short time. This potion is so powerful that it`s enough to take just the smallest sip, hence you can use it many times

eff.info: La compétence "Télékinésie" détermine votre abilité à déplacer divers objets avec de la magie, et peut aussi servir de soutien pour sauter.[br]- A chaque point investi, la consommation de pouvoir magique pour la télékinésie et le double saut diminue.[br]- A chaque montée de niveau, votre pouvoir télékinésique augmente, vous permettant de déplacer des objets plus lourds et les ennemis auront plus de difficulté à échapper à votre prise télékinésique.

La compétence "Melee weapons" determines combat effectiveness with any melee weapon. [br]- Each invested skill point increases damage by #1.[br]- Each skill level allows using more advanced weapons. Insufficient skill level decreases attack speed and increases action points consumption in S.A.T.S.

La compétence "Firearms" determines your ability to handle pistols, rifles, shotguns and, a minigun. [br]- Each invested skill point increases damage and accuracy of these weapons by #1.[br]- Each skill level allows using more advanced weapons. Insufficient skill level will make you miss more often

La compétence "Energy weapons" determines your ability to handle different laser, plasma or pulse weapons and a flamethrower. [br]- Each invested skill point increases damage and accuracy of these weapons by #1.[br]- Each skill level allows using more advanced weapons. Insufficient skill level will make you miss more often

La compétence "Explosives" determines your ability to work with everything that is capable of exploding. [br]- Each invested skill point increases the damage of your explosives by #1, also increases throwing distance for grenades.[br]- Each skill level allows using and creating more advanced explosives, improves success rate at defusing and helps you detect enemy mines from a longer distance

La compétence "Magic" determines your knowledge of magical arts, directly affecting power of your spells, both offensive and defensive. [br]- Each invested skill point increases damage of your offensive spells by #1, and defensive - by #2.[br]- Each skill level decreases cooldown time for all spells

La compétence "Repair" helps you keeping your weapons and armor in good condition, and using mechanisms of all sorts. [br]- Each invested skill point increases the effectiveness of repairs by #1 (with base value of #2) and increases damage for the crafted weapon by #3.[br]- Each skill level enables you creating advanced weapons, also repairing or shutting down more complex mechanisms

La compétence "Medicine" directly affects your health and ability to heal yourself without medic`s help. [br]- Each invested skill point increases the effectiveness of healing potions and other medication by #1 (with base value of #2).[br]- Each skill level increases your maximal health and enables you to operate special medical instrumentation

La compétence "Lockpicking" allows you to open mechanical locks. [br]- Each invested skill point increases probability to open a lock and decreases chance of jamming. [br]- Each skill level allows you to pick locks of more sophisticated design

La compétence "Science" represents your knowledge in different scientific fields, particularly those about electronics and information technology. [br]- Each invested skill point increases the chance of successful hacking of electronic locks and protected terminals.[br]- Each skill level enables you breaking through more advanced defense systems, and using additional PipBuck features by applying special extension modules

La compétence "Sneak" allows you to move unnoticed by enemies or to attack them from ambush, suddenly and deadly. [br]- Each invested skill point makes you harder to be noticed or heard. [br]- With each skill level a chance to deal critical damage to an enemy who hasn`t seen you is increased by #1. It also helps you to shut down alarm systems

La compétence "Barter" helps you to negotiate with all sorts of merchants in the Wasteland to get better goods and services for a lower price. [br]- Each invested skill point decreases prices for purchasing and repairs by #1. [br]- Each skill level expands the selection of merchants` goods and allows you to access some exclusive deals, that can`t be found anywhere else

La compétence "Survie" represents ancient knowledge almost forgotten by ponies but mastered and perfected by zebras. With this knowledge, you will survive where others would perish. [br]- Each invested skill point increases your resistance to any damage by #1.[br]- Each skill level increases your damage threshold by #2 and enables you to prepare magical potions by zebras` recipes
With each level of this skill the damage of any weapon is increased by #1
With each level your resistance to any damage increases by #1
With each level of this skill, you gain an additional ability for each level up

Alicorn Armor is equipped with magical wings that allow flying. You can accelerate in flight by holding the @1 key (consumes magic). The "Telekinesis" skill level determines maximum flight speed, as well as the magic consumption rate
The outer shell of Alicorn Armor is made of magically reinforced titanium alloy plates. Your damage threshold increases depending on the "Repair" skill level
The Alicorn Armor`s medical systems constantly restore health of the wearer. The health recovery rate depends on the level of the "Medicine" skill
The Alicorn Armor has a built-in instant teleportation spell. You can use instant teleportation using the @1 key, the magic consumption rate depends on the "Lockpick" skill level
The Alicorn Armor is equipped with a powerful shield generator. You can activate the magical shield by pressing @1 key. The strength of the shield depends on the "Science" skill level
The holographic systems of the Alicorn Armor obscures enemies` targeting, preventing them from hitting you. Additional dodging bonus depend on the "Sneak" skill level
The inner lining of the Alicorn Armor is made of the "smart" plastic that is normally elastic but instantly hardens when damaged. Resistance to any external damage depends on the "Barter" skill level

You can levitate yourself using magical power. To do this, press and hold @1 while being in the air. Press the @2@3@4@5 movement keys to move sideways, down or up. Moving upwards consumes more magical power. At the second level of this ability the consumption of magic will decrease, and the time and range of flight increase
"It`s not very far, just move your little rump. You can make it if you try with a hop, skip and jump!" Now you can jump half a meter higher!
You are always watchful and careful. You never activate a trap or a pressure plate, and enemy mines are triggered with a delay
Even though you like to explode stuff, you don`t forget about safety. Any explosion causes you less damage
Fire inflicts less damage to you. Also decreases a chance for you to be set on fire
Enemies will have a hard time trying to hit you. You evasion bonus increased
Trainings with melee weapons gave great results. Now you are harder to get wounded with sharp items. Resistance to cutting damage increased
You got so used to being hit with heavy stuff, now it just tickles. Resistance to blunt weapons increased
You lost count of bullets being shot at you. This made you tougher, your bullet resistance is permanently increased
Vous êtes un fan de trèèèès gros pistolets ! Vous vous êtes tellement habitué à les porter que vous ne remarquez même pas leur poids.
You reload weapons twice quicker than before. It is a great advantage - less chance to get killed while you desperately try to reload
You have a habit of searching through every trash can on your way, hence you always find more caps and pre-War bits
You learned to be more careful when picking locks. In case of failure, pin break twice less often, and lock is damaged #1 less
You are such a cool hacker, that even security systems provide you with additional attempts for picking a password (#1 instead of #2)!
Your body adsorbs and converts chemicals much faster than average, therefore healing potions become #1 more effective and restore health #2 times faster
You never stay put, always rushing somewhere. You get #1 action points extra (to #2 initial points) in S.A.T.S. for every level of this ability
You always showed interest to insects, spiders, and other arthropods, and you learned their weaknesses. You cause #1 more damage to radscorpions, radroaches, bloatsprites and similar creatures
You know pony anatomy so well, that you always aim at vital organs. You cause #1 more damage to raiders and other equine enemies
You know schematics for any robot by heart, and always aim at their weak points. You cause #1 more damage to robots and turrets
You believe that the Wasteland must be cleansed of monsters and mutated beasts. You cause #1 more damage to feral ghouls and mutants

You have learned to shoot accurately even while running or from an unsteady position. The accuracy penalty for shooting while running is reduced to #1 (with base penalty value #2), and the penalty for shooting while jumping or while climbing stairs has been reduced to #3 (base penalty value #4). Does not affect shooting with S.A.T.S.

You keep calm during a fight and prefer systematic shooting or a tactical retreat to rushing headlong into battle. Accuracy bonus when firing while standing still is increased to #1 (#2 by default), and accuracy loss from shooting behind your back is decreased tp #3 (#4 by default). Only affects shooting without using S.A.T.S.
You calibrated your PipBuck so that now any attack in S.A.T.S. consumes #1 less action points, and on the second level of ability - #2 less
Good luck always follows you on a battlefield. Your critical damage chance is increased by #1 for every level of this perk
When you get lucky on a battlefield, your enemy can sure feel the difference! You get +#1 to critical damage with any weapon

Vous n'êtes pas un grand fan de grandes et lourdes armes. Votre choix - les pistolets et les revolvers, et vous savez bien les utiliser. Toutes vos armes à une main (automatiques incluses) obtiennent un bonus de précision et consomment #1 point d'action en moins dans le S.A.T.S.

Your favorite weapon - a shotgun, with that you are ready to protect yourself and your property either from raiders, bandits or a darn army of dragons! All your shotguns get armor piercing and increased knockback effects

You are absolutely sure that there is no weapon better than an assault rifle. And you sure know how to get the best from it. Your assault rifles and a minigun cause more damage by 2 points per each bullet
You are a great shooter, for whom every bullet counts. All your hunting and sniper rifles get a critical hit bonus
Laser weapons are your favorites. You know how to handle it so that it causes 15% more damage
You love to turn enemies into puddles of slime with plasma weapons. You even learned to deal with its drawbacks, so that now your plasma weapons are more accurate, and plasma reaches target #1 faster

You love to set things on fire since you were little, your favorite smell is of petroleum, and your favorite hobby - watch enemies turn into ashes. Any weapon causing fire damage (including grenades) becomes more powerful

All your laser and plasma weapons get a #1 chance to disintegrate target - that is to completely annihilate it with a single shot (the weapon becomes about #2 cooler), providing that the target has no more health left than 10 times the weapon`s damage

You always clean and oil your weapons, and in return they never let you down in a critical moment. A probability that a worn weapon misfires is decreased #1 times, even though its damage and accuracy still decrease
Surprisingly, you adapted well to life in the toxic and irradiated Wasteland. You get a bonus to radiation resistance, and also to resistance against toxic and corrosive substances
You learned to survive among wild animals and monsters. You get a bonus to protection against bites and scratches, stings and spikes and so on, and suffer less from wounds and poisoning

You know how to improve your armor and make it fit perfectly, thus increasing its battle qualities. To do this you require workbench and proper materials. The second level of this perk allows you to further enhance your armor for one more time
The range of your telekinetic grasp is increased. Also, now you can lift and perform other telekinetic actions with objects that are out of your sight

You throw nothing away. To that extent, that it is hard to enter your room without breaking legs. On the other hoof, you get additional weapon fragments each time you find a weapon that you already have, and also find more useful (in your personal opinion) garbage
You learned to supply all grenades with an advanced sensor, so that now they explode right after hitting an enemy! (To use ordinary grenades, hold @1 when throwing)
Any armor has weak spots and you know it very well. Any stubbing-cutting weapon (like knives, swords, axes and spears) gets additional armor-piercing effect
Any blunt weapon (like a bat, a crowbar or a sledgehammer) gets a chance to stun enemy for #1 seconds. Its knockback effect is also increased

Not only you are able to move objects with telekinesis, but also you can make them plummet through the air! To do that, press @1 when levitating an object. You can try to hit an enemy with a heady box or smash him against a wall. The second level of this perk allows you to throw objects even faster and further. Keep in mind - pushing heavy objects rapidly burns your magical power

You receive an ability to instantly move between places. To use it press and hold @1 while the spell charges, then release to perform teleportation. To cancel already charged spell press @2. You must see the point of arrival. Consumes quite a lot of magical energy

Countless hours spent with a cauldron, a retort, and a boiling cube brought their fruits! Now, when making potions, you receive two bottles of potion instead of one, consuming the same amount of ingredients. Does not work on permanent effect potions
Damage from your bare-hoof kicks is increased by #1. Now you can break sturdy and reinforced doors with your hind legs and stun enemies for a short period of time
Radiation does not kill you, but only makes you stronger. The higher your radiation level, the fewer injuries you get. Also, radiation can not reduce your health by more than 80%

You understand automatic security systems like none other. From any terminal controlling the turrets, you can not just simply turn them off, but reconfigure them so that they begin attacking your opponents. Meanwhile, you get all experience from the turret`s kills
The blast radius for any explosives you use increases by #1
When it comes to mines and minefields, you have no equal. The mines you install are #1 more powerful, and in addition, your mines do not detonate from nearby explosions
You have mastered the cold steel to perfections. The attack speed of any melee weapon (except chainsaw and similar) is increased by #1
You are so used to using attack magic in battles, that it almost does not tire you. With each level of this ability, you spend less magical energy on combat spells

You always know how to throw a grenade or shoot a grenade launcher so that you are not personally affected by the explosion. With this ability, you receive only 25% of the damage from your own explosives, including its special varieties
Your medical knowledge helps you using combat chemistry properly. Now it works for you #1 times longer

You have studied medicine well and you know how to turn yourself into a death machine with help of the chemicals. Effects from substances such as Mint-als, Buck, Dash, Rage, Med-X, are amplified. At the same time, the chances of getting addicted to them are reduced #1 times

Your talents as an economist contribute to the development of trade. All traders start importing more ammunition, medicine and other popular goods. Also, a traveling trader with rare goods begins visiting the "The prancing pony" camp
A special psychological connection with your companion gives him new strength. With each level of this ability, the defense and attack of your companion significantly increases

Life in the harsh conditions of the wasteland increased your endurance. Now in combat you can run and jump longer without experiencing fatigue. Stamina consumption for running and jumping during battle is reduced by #1

You learned to hold the weapon with telekinesis so that there is less impact from recoil. Now you can sustain burst fire longer without fear of losing a target. This also increases the accuracy of assault rifles
Let`s make some holes in `em! Your heavy machine guns receive additional armor-piercing properties, and their bullet spread is decreased #1 times
Due to some features of your organism, electricity and lightning cause you 20% less damage

You optimized all your weapons that use various batteries to consume less energy. With a #1 probability each shot from such a weapon will be free of charge, that is, it will not consume the battery charge
You are always a little more lucky than other hunters for valuable junk. You will find more cartridges and explosives in containers
Due to the fact that you always carefully look after your armor, it serves you #1 longer. That allows saving considerably on its repair
With help of your telekinesis, you can jump once in mid-air. The height of this second jump depends on the skill level of "Telekinesis"
Vous avez failli mourir, mais vous avez été sauvé par le Système de Secours d'Urgence MSA.
Your health became stronger! (+#1 per ability level)
Your magical power reserve is increased! (+#1 per ability level)
Zebra potion fortified your bones. Now you get #1 less injuries with each level of this ability
Zebra potion improved natural defense systems of your body. You get +#1 resistance to poisoning, bleeding and radiation for each level of this ability
Zebra potion improved your reflexes and increased aggression. You deal #1 more melee damage for each level of this ability
Zebra potion strengthened your muscles and increased stamina capacity. You receive +#1 to running speed and fatigue resistance for each level of this ability
Zebra potion augmented your nervous system and sharpened your sight. It increases shooting accuracy #1 per each level of this ability
Zebra potion strengthened your intuition. You gain +#1 to evasion bonus for each level of this ability
Zebra potion enhanced your luck. You gain +#1 to chance of critical hit for each level of this ability
A magical potion strengthened the connection between you and the elemental forces of nature. Your attack spells power is increased by #1 for each level of this ability
You`ve learned a lot about the anatomy of ghouls, and therefore inflict them #1 more damage
You learned something special about fighting with alicorns. Now you deal them #1 more damage
You can memorize more spells
You`re burning! You need to jump into water to stop it
You got splashed with some corrosive substance, and now it corrupts your armor and burns your hide
You are in stealth-mode
You are in stealth-mode
The concepts "right" and "left" for you temporarily changed places
eff.mess: You fell under the telepathic attack!

eff.info: You can`t control yourself and try to flee to someplace else
eff.mess: You fell under the telepathic attack!

eff.info: These voices in your head do not stop... and they order you to kill!
eff.mess: You fell under the telepathic attack!

eff.info: Frozen creatures are vulnerable to bullets, strikes and explosions, and their speed decreases by #1. Their fire resistance, on the other hoof, is increased
It became almost impossible to aim properly. Accuracy reduced by #1
You were hit hard by a blast wave. You have reduced speed (-#1), accuracy (-#2) and melee attack speed (-#3), and increased magic energy consumption by #4
You recently swum or got into a heavy rain. In any case, your fire resistance is temporarily increased, but resistance to frost and electricity is decreased
The movement of all nearby enemies is slowed down
Reanimation module has recently been used and now is recharging
You have recently taken an antidote, your resistance to poisons is temporarily increased by #1
Radiation resistance increased by #1
Your intelligence, sight and hearing are improved, and with them - ability to pick locks (+#1), hack terminals (+#2) and use explosives (+#3)
Your intelligence, sight and hearing are improved, and with them - ability to pick locks (+#1), hack terminals (+#2) and use explosives (+#3)
You`ve got post Mint-als after effects, meaning that you temporarily got dumber, with hearing and sight impaired. You lockpicking decreased by #1 and hacking decreased by #2
When you are not under the influence of mint-als, you completely lose the sharpness of perception and clarity of thinking, and with them the ability to break locks (-#1) and hack terminals (-#2)
Your speed and jump height are increased by #1 and #2 action points were added
Your speed and jump height are greatly increased (+#1) and #2 action points were added
You`re slow as hay!
You are so used to Dash that without it you crawl like a snail. You lose #2 action points, and your speed is reduced by #1
You are in a chemical rage state. Damage by any weapon in increased by #1
A feeling of deep apathy took over, you don`t want to fight anymore. Damage by any weapon in decreased by #1
Your abuse of Rage has led to the fact that without it you can no longer normally fight. Damage from any of your attacks is reduced by #1
You are temporarily mute to pain, any damage to you is decreased by #1
After pain-killer effect wears off, you feel pain much sharper than before
Your addiction to Med-X-y made your sensitivity to pain increase. Any damage you get is increased by #1 for each level of addiction
Your strength and endurance are temporarily increased. Health increased by #1, stamina consumption for running decreased by #2, damage threshold +#3, kick strength +#4
You feel overwhelming weakness and sleepiness. Health decreased by #1, stamina consumption for running increased by #2
When you are not under the influence of Buck, your health is decreased by #1. Also, running takes #2 more stamina
You are temporarily mute to pain, your damage resistance is increased by #2, and the damage of any of your weapons is increased by #1
You have a deep depression, and everything hurts. The damage of any weapon is reduced by #1, and your resistance to damage is reduced by #2
Without a regular dose of Stampede, you are in a constant depression. The damage of any weapon is reduced by #1, and your resistance to damage is reduced by #2
Your health is being restored, and traumas and internal injuries are being magically mended
While your organism recovers after shock caused by Hydra, healing potions have #1 effectiveness
You can fly!
You became a shadow. Enemies can not hurt you, but you can`t fight as well
Reduced consumption and faster recovery of magical energy by #1, and increased spell power by #2
Your sight is magically augmented
You can breathe underwater and swim faster
Resistance to the Pink Cloud in all its forms is increased
Allows you once to avoid death
No external influence can cause you any damage
You have become a desman. In this form you are able to climb into very narrow passages. To return to your original form press @1. Attention! Make sure there is enough space!
You`ve been touched by dark and powerful magic. Healing potions will not heal you until the curse is lifted. Pay a visit to the nearest practicing magician
Your speed and jumping height are significantly reduced, and you are completely deprived of stamina
Your magic has temporarily weakened, therefore your accuracy, damage from melee weapons and magic decreased, as well as strength of the telekinetic throw
The moment this effect wears off you will receive damage equal to #1 of your maximum health
You receive #1 of the damage you deal to enemies
The magical chain binds you to the point where you were at the moment the curse was cast, and does not allow you to leave it
The toxin of the Pink Cloud got into your blood and now slowly kills you from inside
Healing potions have no effect on you
Complete invulnerability to any external damage
Accuracy reduced by #1, melee attack speed reduced by #2, magic consumption increased by #3
Maximum health reduced by #1, stamina recovery reduced by #3, stamina consumption for running and jumping increased by #2
Running speed reduced by #1, walking speed reduced by #2
Resistance to any external damage reduced by #1, damage of your weapons reduced by #2
Maximum weight you can lift by telekinesis is reduced by #1, combat spells damage reduced by #2

You got a serious doze of alcohol. Your protection and damage from melee weapons are increased, but accuracy and reaction are impaired, and magic consumption increased. Damage resistance #1, melee damage #2, accuracy #3, evasion bonus #4, magic consumption #5
Thanks to the stimulating effect of coffee, your ability to open locks (+#1) and hack terminals (+#2) has been increased
You ate something, and this temporarily improved your characteristics. At the same time, only one food effect can be active. The effect of other food will replace the current one
Health increased by #1
Speed ​​and stamina increased by #1
Accuracy increased by #1
Damage by melee weapons increased by #1
Magic power consumption reduced by #1
Added #1 action points
Resistance to all types of damage increased by #1
Health increased by #1, resistance to physical attacks increased by #2
Speed ​​and stamina increased by #1, added #2 action points
Health increased by #1, resistance to poison and radiation increased by #2
The overall speed, running speed, stamina are increased by #1 and evasion in melee and ranged combat are increased by #2
Health increased by #1, resistance to all types of external damage increased by #2
Damage from combat spells increased by #1, magic consumption reduced by #2
The damage threshold is increased by #1, resistance to all types of external damage is increased by #2
Health increased by #1
Evasion in melee and ranged combat increased by #1
Critical hit chance increased by #1, critical damage increased by #2
Stealth is increased by #1, produced noise is reduced by #2 times
Damage and attack speed of melee weapons increased by #1, and power of a hoof kick - by #2
The damage from combat spells is increased by #1, the strength of the telekinetic throw is increased by #2
Health is increased by #1, lightning resistance is increased by #2, resistance to enemy telekinesis is significantly increased
The ability to crack open all kinds of locks and hack terminals is increased by #1, to repair and defuse bombs is increased by #2
Health is increased by #1, the power of healing potions is increased by #2, and they act faster
Damage from all weapons and magic increased by #1
Damage from firearms and energy weapons increased by #1, recharge speed increased by #2 times
Accuracy is increasedd by #1, attack speed with melee weapons by #2, critical hit chance by #3
Resistance to all types of external damage increased by #1, the power of protective spells increased by #2 of their original power

gui.n: Choisir un slot pour la sauvegarde automatique

gui.info: [Empalu] - concept, programmation, graphismes. [DipFanken] - graphismes, locations design. [Mihasik] - Localisation anglaise. [Apple_Snack], [GreyGazer], [Shadow_Of_History] - participation dans le développement. Le jeu est basé sur l'histoire de "Fallout : Equestria" par [kkat]. Ce jeu est un projet non-commercial et est distribué gratuitement.

gui.n: Entrer le nom de votre personnage
Attention! La sauvegarde automatique sera écrasé
Appuyez sur une touche de votre clavier ou de votre souris pour assigner le bouton. Appuyez sur TAB ou Echap pour annuler. Appuyez sur Suppr pour effacer

gui.info: En mode très facile, vous n'avez pas beaucoup à vous en faire. Vous commencez avec 200 points de vie , +25 par niveau. La vie des ennemis est baissé de 60%. Votre personnage ne sera jamais traumatisé. Retourner au point de sauvegarde ne causera pas de pénalités. Les ennemis ne vous entendent pas très bien.

Le mode facile est pour les débutants. Vous commencez avec 150 points de vie, +25 par niveau. La vie des ennemis est baissé de 30%. La télékinésie et l'auto-lévitation ne consomme pas de magie. Votre personnage recevra deux fois moins de traumatisme. Retourner au point de sauvegarde ne causera pas de pénalités. Les ennemis ne vous entendent pas très bien.

La difficulté normale est prévue pour les joueurs plus expérimentés. Vous commencez avec 100 points de vie, +20 par niveau. Votre personnage recevra des traumatismes additionnels en s'évanouissant et reviendra au point de contrôle. La difficulté est plus ou moins équilibrée.

En difficile, vous devrez agir avec prudence pour survivre. Vous commencez avec 170 points de vie, +15 par niveau. Your character gets even more traumas when faints and is returned to the checkpoint. Doctor`s care costs more. Bleeding and poisoning last twice longer. Teleportation to the base camp from checkpoints is not available. Enemies are generally stronger

Super-hard mode is designed for fans of the toughest hardcore. You start the game with 40 health points, +10 per level. The character will get serious injuries if loses consciousness and is returned to the control point. You will find much fewer caps and bits in containers. Enemies are even stronger

You will immediately find yourself in the base camp, the training location will be unavailable Do not choose this option if you play the version 0.7 for the first time and do not wish to miss some important points in the story!
Restoration at checkpoints and returning to the base after receiving dangerous injuries will be disabled. The death of the character is final. The game is stored in a single selected slot
Level up requires 40% less experience points
En montant de niveau, les compétences et aptitudes seront choisies aléatoirement. Testez vos capacités de survie avec ce qui vous est apporté par la chance.

Vous ne recevrez que 3 points de compétence par niveau au lieu de 5. Augmenter les niveaux de compétence au maximum sera bien plus difficile. Vous devrez choisir avec prudence de quelles compétences vous aurez besoin.

Dans ce mode, la plupart des objets ont un poids. Vous serez capable de transporter et d'utiliser un nombre limité d'objets et d'armes. Ce mode est recommandé aux joueurs expérimentés qui ne jouent pas pour la première fois.

gui.n: Il était une fois dans le royaume magique d'Equestria... ... vint une époque où les idéaux d'amitié cédèrent la place à l'envie, à l'égoïsme, à la cupidité et à la cruauté. La Grande Guerre des ressources naturelles a éclaté, dans laquelle il n'y a eu aucun gagnant. Une étincelle magique frappée par des sabots de poney a rapidement fait rage de manière incontrôlable et s'est transformée en flammes qui ont englouti des continents entiers. Le feu du dragon et la magie noire, transformés en armes destructrices, ont presque mis fin à toute vie sur la planète. Le sol, l'eau et l'air ont été empoisonnés par les radiations, les villes ont été détruites, les civilisations se sont effondrées. Les poneys et leurs ennemis ont presque été effacés de la surface de la terre. L'Apocalypse, prédite par des prophètes fous, auxquels presque personne n'a cru jusqu'au dernier jour, est enfin arrivée... ... Mais ce n'était pas encore la fin. De nombreux poneys ont survécu, certains - se cachant dans les immenses abris-étables souterrains, d'autres - s'adaptant d'une manière ou d'une autre aux nouvelles conditions. L'Apocalypse n'était qu'un prologue pour un autre chapitre sanglant de l'histoire des poneys. Sur les Terres Désolés brûlées et empoisonnées, la violence et la cruauté ne sont pas seulement devenues permises - elles sont désormais des moyens de survie... ... Depuis ce jour, le dernier jour de l'ancien Equestria, environ deux-cent années se sont écoulées...

La défaite des forces de l'Enclave près de l'Etable Pi et la perte de l'un des Thunderheads fut un choc au sein de la communauté des pégases. Essayant de sauver la situation et de restaurer leur réputation, l'Enclave a conduit plusieurs nouvelles attaques vers la surface, mais aucune d'elle n'a abouti à un succès. Les forces combinées de la nouvelle union ont repoussé avec brio les forces de l'Enclave à chaque bataille, achevant des victoires étant jusque là impossible au vu des colonies si dispersées auparavant. Finalement, l'information se répandant parmi les civils à propos de la civilisation des poneys de la surface, cela a mené à un discrédit total du gouvernement de la Grande Enclave des Pégases. Les premières tensions se transformèrent en une révolte ouverte et une tentative de renverser le gourverment. La guerre civile entre les généraux coupables pour leurs crimes de guerre, le reste de la société et l'armée fut rapide et sanglante, et les survivants exclus fut forcés de fuir vers la surface. Résidant dans de multiples bases et camps abandonnés, ils ne posent plus aucun danger mortel que ce soit aux pégases ou aux habitants de la surface, devenant une menace n'attendant que leur éradication dans les Terres Désolées. Despite the terrible damage and heavy losses, inhabitants of Stable Pi were able to survive and adapt for a new world. It became possible mostly due to the help and protection from Prancing Pony residents and the SteelHooves rangers. The Stable residents paid their debt with technology and rare resources. Medical equipment and supplies, food reserves, pre-war plant seeds helped Prancing Pony and Covertsign residents to enter a new age of growth and development. Soon, the so-called "aid exchange" grew into close cooperation and trade, which turned these settlements into islands of prosperity in the harsh emptiness of the Wasteland. When the war ended, Covertsign zebras were finally able to experience the feeling they have been missing for many years - security. Led by Askari and with Velvet Remedy`s help settlers overcame hunger, disease and poverty. And though the Equestrian Wasteland still threaten them with raiders, slavers and dangerous predators, the Legion exiles were no longer afraid of the all-seeing eye of their vengeful brethren. Destruction of the regional headquarters and defeat in the war against SteelHooves ruined Caesar`s ambitious plans of conquering these lands, and the Chosen by Fate was forced to turn his gaze to places less difficult to conquer. The removal of the Legion and Enclave threats meant that the time of peace for Covertsign has finally come. The Prancing Pony Camp has been the largest peaceful settlement in these lands even before @lp was sent to the surface. Now, with new allies and technologies, it began looking like a real city, similar to the pre-war villages in number of settlers. Many ponies headed here searching for a peaceful life, and even some natives of Stable and Covertsign moved to live in a growing camp. Calamity, who became the main negotiator in affairs between the allied settlements, also made considerable efforts for the prosperity of his home. The inhabitants of the Prancing Pony could sleep peacefully, knowing that they were guarded not only by guns of patrols, but also by their close friendship with the Steel Rangers. Covertsign zebras, natural-born scouts, always warned them ahead about possible threats, and scientists and technicians from Stable Pi provided the Prancing Pony with the latest automatic turret system. And as the camp received support from the allies, it always helped them in return. After eliminating the Enclave threat, SteelHooves devoted himself to the protection and security of his new allies. In return, SteelHooves rangers received regular supply shipments from the “Prancing Pony", and the brothergood archives became filled with secrets of the Stable Pi scientists. Needed so badly after a long and exhausting war, new recruits joined the ranks, many of which previously fought side by side with knights in the war against Enclave. And though these lands were still full of dangers, hope began warming the heart of the old pony. The hope that the Wasteland era will not be the final chapter of pony history, and that sprouts of the new society will manage to grow into something like the old Equestria was. Even though he always had much to do in other places, the Watcher never forgot about a new corner of peace in the Wasteland. Not only because he considered himself obligated to preserve it, but also because here he hoped to find ponies suitable for his mysterious purpose. But he always paid special attention to the one which, after a while, he began calling his friend. The Watcher and @lp have helped each other many times, both during the war with the Enclave and after it. And though @lp might never admit this, and perhaps she haven`t even thought about it, it was her who became the catalyst for all those events that happened to others. Not only through the fulfillment of the Mentor`s mission and not only by its influence on the political situation in the region. Like a shooting star, she went through lives of many ponies, changing them and bringing into motion. If not for the desire to help her home in return to all her previous support, the inhabitants of the "Prancing Pony" would never have given so much effort in restoring Stable Pi. If not for her example of reckless courage, Covertsign zebras would never have found strength to stop living underground. Had it not been for the hope, raised by her determination to confront all the horrors and depravities of the Wasteland, SteelHooves would not have seized on a ghostly chance to recover Equestria`s past. However, @lp herself did not feel any pride in her actions. In an effort to help her friends and atone for guilt, however real or imaginary, for all the bloodshed that happened with her participation, she tirelessly fought the Enclave, and after the victory she began fighting lesser threats. Perhaps @lp thought it was a thing she could do the best. Perhaps she was simply uncomfortable living a peaceful life. However, it was clear that @lp learned many of the Wasteland lessons. And the first of them was that one should never forget what distinguishes ponies from monsters. Compassion.

The combined forces of the Prancing Pony, the SteelHooves Rangers, and Covertsign zebras were able to defend Stable Pi by defeating the common enemy. @lp may have contributed the most to the destruction of the pegasus air citadel. However, this alliance was not destined to survive for long: the greatly weakened yet still mortally dangerous, Enclave recognized new enemies and launched military operations against them. Without a unifying core capable of maintaining nascent confidence in each other, the inhabitants of the united settlements preferred to concentrate their forces for defending themselves, and this ultimately worked in enemy`s favor. After such a terrible defeat from the surface savages, the Enclave lost trust and authority in the eyes of the civilian population and needed good news. The good news came from a series of victories over the SteelHooves Rangers, who were forced to defend themselves both from the pegasi and the remnants of Coldsight`s forces at the same time. Lacking support from outside, SteelHooves dispersed his forces to retain territory, and the destruction of their part by quick and merciless raids became an occasion that allowed the Enclave to boast its victory and maintain its position at the helm of the Pegasus society, fighting a protracted war against the surface, still merciless, but no longer so large-scale and costly for the tired and embittered society. As the war continued, the inhabitants of Stable Pi were abandoned by their recent allies, who were more worried about their own survival. Only their former comrades, the "Chosen Ones" Velvet Remedy and @lp, stayed to help, but their strength was not enough. After restoring a semblance of a former life, the new Stable leadership decided to shut their doors once again. But this time they will be ready to attack first anyone who dares to endanger their way of life. And Stable Pi ponies will never allow themselves trusting the Wasteland savages again. Covertsign was perhaps the luckiest of all: their small settlement was hard to spot, and their former allies, the "Prancing Pony" camp and SteelHooves Rangers, were the goals of much higher priority for the Enclave. Using their long-practiced skills of hidden existence, they successfully avoided the unnecessary attention of the enemy. However, their life certainly did not get better, despite all the efforts that Velvet made to save the zebras. A constant threat from the sky forced the “Prancing Pony” camp to live in a state of siege. Its inhabitants never part with weapons, defense systems are maintained in perfect condition, and healthy sleep has been forgotten as a luxury of old times. To make things harder, the pegasi used tactics of starving the inhabitants out, with small hunting groups searching and destroying everypony trying to get food and ammunition for the camp using the old-fashioned method of expeditions to the pre-war ruins. Nevertheless, the resilience and resourcefulness of the camp residents allowed them to keep the Enclave threat out, and Calamity, who became the defense leader, constantly made attempts to counterattack the enemy. After losing a significant portion of his forces first in the battle for Stable Pi and then during the Enclave raids, SteelHooves was forced to order the give up most of the territory controlled by his rangers, focusing on defending key objects located in vicinity if each other. It gave his enemies a break, and the remaining Coldsight forces seized the opportunity. Reorganized under the leadership of the new commander, Sacred Flame, they went on a large-scale offensive. From that moment on, SteelHooves had to forget about defeating them, returning to a grueling positional war. Despite all the efforts the Watcher made to preserve the union of settlements, it suffered one defeat after another. When it became apparent that the nascent sprout of trust and mutual assistance had finally perished, he focused his efforts on helping other ponies, unknown here, and forces in other parts of Equestria. However, he did not forget about the two Stable Pi dwellers, whom he had noticed earlier. Both @lp and Velvet Remedy stay in touch with the Watcher, whom he helps cope with ordeals of the Wasteland, torn by brutal and meaningless wars. @lp did everything she could trying to help the settlements fight the Enclave. Having made an invaluable contribution to the defense of each of her allies, she often fearlessly threw herself on the front line. However, the collapse of such a bright but short-lived union fell heavily on her heart. The hope that, as Calamity predicted, her example would form the basis of friendship between the settlements, had died, as well as the hope of saving ponies from many deaths in the war against the pegasi. Under a burden of realization of her being powerless to stop the massacre that began through her fault and to help her home, the soul of @lp gradually plunged into depression and despair. However, she is not so easy to break. Full of grim determination and bitterness, @lp continues fighting enemies, be it a pegasus, a slaver or a ranger. And nopony, even herself, can say why: in the name of redemption or in order to quench the flames growing inside her, flames of anger for this cruel, unjust and hopeless world.

Despite her unwavering courage and the power of the armor created by Stable Pi scientists, @lp fell in an unequal battle against the Enclave soldiers. Her death in the battle for Stable Pi determined the outcome of the entire war. Without her help in battle with Thunderhead, the allies did not have enough strength to take over the air citadel, and they all were destroyed by the overwhelming firepower of the pegasi. But this meant more than just losing Stable Pi. The retaliatory operation "Nemisis" provoked by the destruction of the research facility went ravaging through the surface of the Wasteland, destroying all noticeable islands of a newly emerging civilization. The "Prancing Pony" was turned to ashes, bases and fortresses of SteelHooves rangers after fierce but short-lived resistance fell one after another. All other major settlements within several hundred miles around also suffered from the ruthless anger of the Grand Pegasus Enclave, and their inhabitants died without even understanding what caused this act of revenge. When the pegasi returned behind the clouds, there was no pony left in the Wasteland who could rally the survivors, and the weak and scattered groups of ponies were torn apart one after another by raiders, slavers and creatures worse than them. After a few years this entire area of ​​Equestria was almost completely devoid of intelligent life. Except for pegasi, whose research missions continued to study and plunder pre-war bases and warehouses, nopony else lived in these places...
@1 - sélectionner la cible@@2 - annuler la sélection, retour@@3 ou @4 - accepter
The hints contain direct instructions on how to pass the test. Use them if you do not know what to do

pip.info: Votre état de santé actuel. Définit combien vous pouvez prendre de dégâts avant de perdre connaissance et retourner au dernier point de contrôle.
Les maladies liées à la radioactivité magique baissent votre niveau de vie. Prenez un RadAway pour vous nettoyer des radiations.
Le taux de poison dans votre corps. Vous allez perdre des points de vie jusqu'à prendre un antidote ou que l'effet se dissipe.
Les plaies ouvertes vous font graduellement perdre du sang. Même si les saignements finiront par s'arrêter, il est préférable d'utiliser des bandages.

Montre vos dégâts internes, séparément pour la tête, le corps, et les membres. Ils sont difficiles à soigner sur le terrain, les potions médicales ne suffiront pas. Tu auras besoin de l'aide d'un médecin qualifié ou de compétences en médecine et d'équipements spéciaux. Les blessures à la tête entraînent des pénalités pour la précision, la vitesse d'attaque et la magie, les blessures corporelles réduisent l'endurance et les blessures aux jambes réduisent la vitesse de déplacement. Une perte de sang importante affecte également votre capacité à causer des dommages et à résister à la douleur
Tout est en ordre
Diagnostic : une bosse sanglante, une égratignure à l'oreille et un œil au beurre noir. La tendance dans les Terres Désolées

Diagnostic : une lésion cérébrale traumatique légère. Peut causer des maux de tête, des étourdissements et des nausées. Avec un tel traumatisme, il est difficile de penser correctement, d'utiliser la magie ou de viser avec des armes. Consultez votre médecin à la première occasion

Diagnostic : une blessure grave au crâne et au cerveau. La vue et l'ouïe sont altérées. Perte de mémoire possible, hallucinations, réaction inadéquate aux stimuli externes. La limite magique a diminué. Une condition mortelle, consultez un médecin dès que possible
Ton corps est prêt
Diagnostic : quelques contusions, brûlures et coupures. Mieux vaut être plus prudent

Diagnostic : une ou plusieurs côtes sont cassées, certains organes internes sont légèrement endommagés. Peut diminuer l'endurance, provoquer une dyspnée, une respiration douloureuse. Un bon repos au lit est recommandé

Diagnostic : multiples fractures des côtes, multiples blessures internes, lésions de la colonne vertébrale suspectées. Risque d'insuffisance cardiaque. Une condition mortelle, une hospitalisation immédiate est nécessaire
Rien ne fait mal
Diagnosis: a sprained ankle. Don`t step on this leg at least for a week

Diagnosis: at least one leg is broken, others have multiple minor injuries. You can not run and jump as usual in this condition. It is highly recommended mending the fractured bone, fix the broken leg and avoid any physical activities
Diagnosis: multiple open fractures, ankle ligament rupture, a knee shot. It is surprising that you can move at all in this condition. Immediately contact the nearest Ministry of Peace office
You are full of strength
Diagnosis: you lost some blood, but that`s OK. A good rest and well nourishment will bring you back to normal
Diagnosis: you suffer from severe blood loss. Possible sudden muscle weakness, dizziness, loss of consciousness. Donor or synthetic blood transfusion is recommended
Diagnosis: you are dying from blood loss. Immediately take the necessary actions before it`s too late
You have maximum magical power
You are tired a little, but your magical power is still ok
Your magical power requires restoration. Spells and telekinesis may be somewhat weaker than usual

Your magical power is on the verge of complete exhaustion. Spells and telekinesis are considerably weakened. It is strongly advised to have some rest, perform restorative procedures and at all cost avoid using complex spells in this condition
Your magical power is depleted. You can hardly even lift small objects, not to mention any spells
This value is subtracted from any damage you take (except from prolonged effects - for example, it doesn`t reduce damage from burning, bleeding, or poisoning)

The amount of physical damage you take is reduced by the armor level value, that is if bullet or melee weapon hit your armor. Affects only physical damage such as from bullets, melee weapons, blast damage etc. Depends on type and condition of the armor you wear. If condition drops below 50%, protection decreases

This value is subtracted from magical energy damage, if magical beam or projectile hit armor. Affects only magical damage such as fire, laser, plasma, lightning, or frost. Depends on type and condition of the armor you wear. If condition drops below 50%, protection decreases

This value shows how much body surface is covered by your armor. In fact, it is a probability that a strike or a projectile hits your armor, in which case damage will be reduced, or an uncovered body part. Depends on type and condition of the armor you wear. If condition drops below 50%, protection decreases

The higher this indicator is, the more often enemies with long-range weapons miss. The probability of hitting you is divided by the absolute value of evasion. For example, the "+ 20%" bonus means that the probability of hitting you is divided by 1.2
The higher this indicator is, the harder it is for enemies to see you, and the more time it will take them to discover you. Does not account for a StealthBuck effect
Only for external damage. Does not protect against health reduction resulting from poisoning, bleeding and other internal damage
Bonus to damage from any of your weapons and spells
Bonus to damage of melee weapons
Bonus to damage of combat spells
Bonus to damage of firearms and magical energy weapons
Suppresses health damage caused by venom in your body
Suppresses blood loss caused by open wounds
Reputation depends on the number of side quests you complete. Completing simple missions gives one point of reputation, more important, hard and dangerous ones give more
Paint sprays are used to paint on the walls. Hold Shift to use airbrush mode. Attention! All murals are temporary and disappear when you leave the room

Armor-piercing round has a special bullet with a hard core and a soft shell, designed to pierce armor. However, such bullets are less effective against unprotected targets and have a weaker stopping action

The expansive round has a bullet that deforms when it hits a soft environment, such as the victim`s body. Such bullets do more damage to unprotected targets, but at the same time they are very bad at penetrating armor, therefore are not effective against armored targets
In this ammo, 5 arrow-shaped bullets are used instead of the usual shot, good for penetrating armor but having a weaker stopping action
A cartridge that has a magically enchanted bullet that ignites the target on impact
A cartridge that allows exploiting magical energy technologies with common firearms. When hitting a target, the bullet from such a cartridge turns into a ball of plasma
A battery of increased power. Improves damage and gives weapons ability to burn armor, but a weapon wears out more quickly
Fuel with special additives that significantly increase the combustion temperature
A more powerful magical energy model of grenades
Grenade with a pulse charge, designed for fighting against robots

pip.n: Ton niveau est trop bas. C'est une mauvaise idée d'aller par là.
Press to finish the quest and get a reward

pip.info: Cliquez pour utiliser le mode plein écran. Si le jeu est démarré sur un navigateur, cette option peut ne pas marcher.
Désactivez si vous ne jouez pas pour la première fois et que vous n'avez pas besoin d'indices ou de pointeurs.
Désactivez si vous ne jouez pas pour la première fois et que vous ne voulez pas lire les dialogues entre les personnages.
Visualisation des dégâts effectués lors des combats.

pip.n: Afficher les dégâts avec seulement un nombre
pip.info: Lors de tirs au fusil à pompe ou aux armes automatiques, le total des dégâts sera affiché en un nombre seulement, au lieu d'un nombre individuel pour chaque coup.
Désactivez cette option uniquement si vous aveez au moins 18 ans, et que votre cerveau est prêt à endurer ce type de langage parfois utilisé par les habitants des Terres Désolées.
Utilise un curseur commun au lieu du curseur du jeu (prendra effet après redémarrage du jeu).
Affiche des messages sur les capacités de la télékinésie.
Affiche des informations sur les touches assignées quand le curseur est en bas de l'écran.
Affiche une fenêtre avec le log d'erreur.

pip.n: [clic] - sélectionner une weapon@[clic droit] - en stockage / reprendre@touches sélection de slots (@1- @2) - assigner
[clic] - équiper l'armure@touches sélection de slots (@1- @2) - assigner
[clic] - utiliser équipement@[clic droit] - jeter (avec [shift] - tout)@touches sélection de slots (@1- @2) - assigner
[clic] - put everything into storage@[clic droit] - pick everything from the storage
[clic] - select 1 unit of product@[clic droit] - cancel selection@hold [shift] - select all
[clic] - leave a weapon in storage or take it back
[clic] - discard a spell or acquire it again
Aucune aptitude ajoutée pour le moment.
Attention ! Le module médical est endommagé. La surveillance de santé est limitée. Veuillez visiter un technicien de PipBuck certifié pour la réparation.
Vous n'avez pas d'objet de valeur à vendre
Pas de plans ou de recettes disponibles
Pas de quête pour le moment

pip.info: Erreur 0-4570-7f45-a420-ff98 (Erreur système, contactez l'administrateur) The likely cause of the failure is an effect of an electromagnetic pulse on the PipBuck systems. Checking the subsystems and modules: • User Status - Not Available • Medical module - not available • Inventory sorter - not available • Cartographic module - not available • Targeting spell - not available • User Interface - Disabled • The operating system kernel - not responding Attention! Reboot required System reboot in progress, please wait .......

pip.n: This is a list of all your weapons and magic. New weapons are indicated by the [☩] symbol. Use [left mouse button] to equip the weapon. You can also use [mouse scroll] to change weapons in game without opening inventory. Use [right mouse button] to remove weapons you are not going to use from the list, or to add them back to the list. Hover over a list item and press [slot selection key] ([1] - [0], [-], [=]) to assign a weapon to the quick access slot, or to cancel the assignment. By pressing the same key in game, you can quickly equip this weapon. You can also press the [slot selection key] together with the @1 key. Thus, the number of available slots increases from 12 to 24. Hover over a grenade, mine, or attack spell and press @2 or @3 to designate them as additional weapons. Thus you will be able to use them together with a main weapon at any time using these keys. If no additional weapon is assigned, pressing the @4 key will use the last selected explosive, and the @5 key will activate the last selected combat spell. In addition, you can assign a defensive spell to the quick spell slot using one of the [quick spell keys] (see control settings). By pressing the same key in game you can immediately apply the selected spell without having to equip it. The right side of the screen shows weapon characteristics. Damage: basic weapon damage (in parentheses is the actual damage that depends on your characteristics, in square brackets is the number of pellets for shotguns) Damage per second: damage per second based on your characteristics (in brackets - approximate damage per second based on the time for reloading) AP: action points for a shot at S.A.T.S. (in parentheses - the number of shots per burst shot in S.A.T.S. for automatic weapons) Range: the distance in blocks at which the weapon will be guaranteed to hit the target. In reality this value is relative and depends on the weapon mastery skill and other factors

This is a list of your armor and amulets. Use [left mouse button] to put on or remove armor. Hover over an item and press [slot selection key] ([1] - [0], [-], [=]) to assign the item to a quick access slot, or to cancel the assignment. By pressing the same key in game, you can quickly put on this armor, unless you are being attacked. You can also use the [slot selection key] together with the @1 key

This is a list of your equipment, which includes all items that you can use: protective spells, medicines, chemicals, potions, food, tools, books, spray cans. Use [left mouse button] to apply an item or equip a protective spell if you have one (this spell can be used in game using the @2 key).
