Hover over an item and press [slot selection key] ([1] - [0], [-], [=]) to assign this item to the quick access slot, or to cancel the assignment. By pressing the same key in game you can apply this item without opening inventory. You can also use the [slot selection key] together with the @1 key. In addition, you can assign a protective spell to a quick spell slot using one of the [quick spell keys] (see control settings). By pressing the same key in the game, you can immediately apply the selected spell without having to equip it first. New items are indicated by [☩]. Items which quantity has recently increased is indicated by the [+] symbol.

This is a list of all the other things you have, such as valuable items, artifacts, quest items, schematics, components and other junk. These things are either used automatically or are useless and can be sold to merchants

This is a list of all your ammunition and explosives. Ammunition suitable for the currently used weapon is located at the top of the list. Use [left mouse button] to load the weapon with the necessary type of ammunition. You can also use [mouse scroll] along with the @1 key to change ammunition directly in game without opening inventory
In limited inventory mode, most items have weight. All your items are divided into categories, the weights for which are calculated separately

[Weapons] You can take with you and use a limited number of weapons determined by the number of [weapon slots]. Knives and pistols occupy one cell, rifles, shotguns etc. - two, and large-sized weapons - three. Grenades and mines can be used without restrictions. All other weapons are only available at the base camp. Use [right mouse click] to discard a specific weapon and free the slots it occupies. The weapon will be hidden, will not occupy the weapon slots and you won`t be able to use it. You can still find the same weapon on a mission, or you can take it back when you return to the base camp using PipBuck or the weapon stand. You can carry more weapons than you have weapon slots for, but it will slow you down. With a slight overload you will not be able to run and dash, with more overload you will only be able to trot, and finally you won`t be able to move at all. It will not affect movement speed in the base camp, but you won`t be able go anywhere else until you reduce weight. [Magic] You can use a limited number of attacking or defensive spells, all others will be unavailable. Each spell occupies one [magic slot], otherwise the principle is the same as for weapons. Each extra spell will reduce the magic recovery speed by 25%

[Armor] You can take only one set of armor on a mission, the rest will remain in the base camp, except for protective suits and clothing. On a mission you can change into protective suits and clothing or back into the same armor any time. Amulets can be changed at any time

[Equipment] This includes valuable and fragile items that you may need at any time (even in battle), which is why the inventory sorter puts them in a separate bag: medicine, potions, battle chemicals, StealthBucks, repair kits, runes. Each item has an arbitrary [weight] characteristic, which shows the space it occupies in the inventory. If you take more items than the bag can carry, they might break when you take damage or simply fall out of the bag. [Ammunition] This includes all rounds, batteries and explosives. Due to the dangerous nature of these items and the need for quick access to reload weapons, the inventory sorter puts them in ammo pouches. They cannot be mixed with other items. [Stuff] Most of the other contents of your bags are sorted to the "stuff" category. This includes everything that should not necessary be close at hoof, regardless of a commercial value: food and drinks, books, memory orbs, items for sale, weapon components, armor plates, potion ingredients. Drinks and food can be consumed at any time, but you will have to return to base camp to read books and view memory balls, as those activities require time and a safe place. Ammunition and stuff taken above limit will slow you down just like weapons. Overloads from inventory items of different categories do stack. [Miscellaneous] All items which weight is not taken into account. Quest objects, keys, tools (like a screwdriver), PipBuck implants and modules, artifacts, schematics, spray cans. They don`t take inventory space and cannot be laid out or discarded

This is a world map, it displays all locations that you can visit. Locations can be of the following types: [Base camps] - these are places where you don`t have to fight, instead you can trade, heal and take missions. [Normal locations] - you can walk through and clear them once, enemies and items will not respawn in them. After completing main objectives in such locations, they are marked as "completed". But you can return to them at any time to open the remaining containers or find secrets. [Generated locations] can be passed and cleared many times in order to earn experience and collect valuable items. Each time you enter them, they will have a new structures, enemies will respawn, and the containers will be untouched and full of various items. Also generated locations have special [trial rooms]. For completing the trials you will be rewarded with valuable items, and many [quest items] can also be found there. Most generated locations have [levels]. At higher levels you will meet new interesting places, enemies and trials, as well as passages to new locations. To move to the next level, you must to go to the end of the location and enter the door with the [Exit] sign. In most cases, you will have to go through at least 2 or 3 levels deep for advancing further in the story. Also, clearing at least 25% of enemies replenishes the assortment of goods available at merchants in base camps. You can go to any available location from the base camp using the wall map or the map in your PipBuck. If you teleport to the base camp from a generated location, use [MAS terminal] for returning to the previous location. If you try returning through the map, the location will be generated anew. Remember, if you save the game while being in a generated location, then after loading you will find yourself in the base camp! Its current configuration will be lost, only the maximum level of location reached and the completed trials are saved

You can save the game in slots (10 slots + autosave slot) or into a file. Saving the game to a file can be used to create backup copies of your saves or to transfer saves between different versions of the game. To save to a file use the [To file] button on the [Save] tab, and for loading use the [From file] button on the [Load] tab and select file location and name.
[Attention! Important!] Des programmes de nettoyage peuvent supprimer les sauvegardes des slots ! Si vous utilisez ce genre de programme, faites des sauvegardes du jeu en utilisant le boutton [To file]. Il est d'ailleurs recommandé de sauvegarder de cette manière périodiquement juste au cas-où.

pip.info: Clique pour choisir quels objets devraient être collectés automatiquement
Collecte automatiquement les nouvelles armes si il y a des slots libres pour elles
Collecte automatiquement une arme si tu as la même arme qui a besoin de réparation
Collecte automatiquement toutes les munitions en sachant qu'il y a assez d'espace dans la section "Munitions"
Collecte automatiquement les munitions compatibles avec les armes que tu as en sachant qu'il y a assez d'espace dans la section "Munitions"
Collecte automatiquement les grenades, les mines et les bombes en sachant qu'il y a assez d'espace dans la section "Munitions"
Collecte automatiquement toutes les potions et médicaments en sachant qu'il y a assez d'espace dans la section "Equipement"
Collecte automatiquement les produits chimiques en sachant qu'il y a assez d'espace dans la section "Equipement"
Collecte automatiquement les StealthBucks, les kits de réparation, des runes et des objets similaires en sachant qu'il y a assez d'espace dans la section "Equipement"
Collecte automatiquement tous les objets qui ne sont ni de l'équipement, ni des munitions, en sachant qu'il y a assez d'espace dans la section "Objets"
Des gemmes, disques, livres d'avant-guerre - tout ce qui peut être vendu aux marchands
Des livres éducatifs et orbes de mémoire
Tout type de nourriture et de breuvage
Des composants pour les armes, armures, explosifs et appareils électriques. Tout ce dont tu as besoin pour travailler à un établi
Ingrédients alchimiques, herbes, parties de monstres... Tout ça est utile pour les potions

pip.n: Laisse quelques armes au stand d'armes et place les objets inutiles dans le stockage
Vous êtes surchargé d'objets. Dans cet état, vous ne pouvez ni courir, ni accélérer
Vous êtes très surchargé d'objets. Dans cet état, vous ne pouvez que trotter et à peine sauter
Vous êtes tellement surchargé que vous ne pouvez même pas faire un seul pas

pip.info: Affecte le temps de rechargement pour n'importe quelle arme utilisant des munitions ou des batteries.
Multiplicateur de chance de toucher pour n'importe quelle arme à distance sort d'attaque.
Multiplicateur de l'impact du sabot.
Affecte n'importe quelle arme au corps-à-corps exceptée celles qui ont leur propre moteur (comme une tronçonneuse ou une auto-hache).
L'efficacité des médicaments comme les potions de soins ou les RadAways.
La vitesse générale de mouvement. Elle peut être affectée par quelques facteurs comme le froid, les commotions cérébrales, l'intoxication à l'alcool ou la surcharge.
Affiche de combien galopper est plus rapide que trotter.
Consommation d'endurance pour courir, sauter et accélérer.
Détéerminé principalement par la compétence "Crochetage", même si certains objets peuvenet changer ce paramètre.
Déterminé principalement par la compétence "Sciences", même si certains objets peuvenet changer ce paramètre.
Consommation générale de la magie pour toutes les actions magiques comme la télékinésie et les sorts d'attaque et de défense.
Separate parameter for attacking spells only. It is multiplied with the "General magic consumption" parameter
The number of action points for attacks with any weapon in S.A.T.S.

Activer cette option mettra le zoom à 100% au début du jeu. Si désactivée, l'échelle sera configurée pour remplir l'écran. Activez cette option si votre moniteur possède une résolution FullHD (1920x1080) ou plus. Pour les plus petites résolutions, désactiver cette option est recommandée pour réduire la charge sur le processeur et améliorer la performance. Vous pouvez toujours zoomer en jeu en appuyant sur la touche @1. Et si la salle ne remplit pas tout l'écran, vous pouvez déplacer la caméra en restant appuyé sur @2.
La caméra tremblera après des explosions et de puissants chocs.

info.n: Rien à faire ici sans outils
Echec de crochetage. L'épingle a cassé
Echec de piratage. Dernière tentative restante
Vous avez eu un choc électrique
Echec de désarmement d'un appareil explosif
Pour nettoyer les radiations, utiliser un RadAway
Quelque chose empêche de fermer cette porte
Vous ne pouvez pas changer de vêtements lors d'un combat !
Vous pouvez changer votre armure seulement au camp de base
Vous ne pouvez pas utiliser ceci durant un combat !
Le PipBuck n'est actuellement pas disponible
Cette arme ne peut être réparée
Munition @1 ne peut être utilisée avec cette arme
Effect from the food has passed
The object is out of sight
You can not leave the room while being attacked
The weapon is not supported by S.A.T.S.
Your weapon skill is not sufficient
Nouvelle étape ajoutée à la mission : "@1"
Attention! A serious injury acquired. Ask doctor for medical assistance
Attention! Multiple injuries detected. Critical medical condition. Immediate hospitalization is required
Injuries incompatible with life. Rest in peace, @1
Attention! You are dying from blood loss. Critical medical condition
User died from blood loss. Rest in peace, @1
You have a small magical exhaustion
Attention! You have a serious magical exhaustion
Attention! Your magical power is depleted. Further magical use is impossible
Your addiction to @1 increased to a medium level
Can`t summon a companion in here
Your companion won`t follow you there
This must be done in a safe place
Merchants have new products for sale
Can assign explosives or spells only
Do not litter in the base camp, use the storage instead
It is better to keep this item
The merchant does not have enough caps to pay for your goods
Items fell out of the bag (@1, @2pcs)
Not available with Alicorn mode active
You don`t have time for this

map.info: Beginning of your journey
Equestrian Wasteland, harsh and cruel
Ruins, occupied by a large raiders gang
A small settlement in which the slavers are based. Here is the entrance to the stable 88
One of those rare safe places where you can rest, treat your wounds and replenish supplies
A partly destroyed "ManeTec" factory complex, occupied by raiders. Apart from them you should watch out for automatic defense systems and occasional monsters
The brain center of the ManeTec factory, where research and development was previously conducted. The central maneframe is somewhere here
Sewage tunnels, filled with sludge, toxic and radioactive waste. It is a lair for various monsters, and wild ghouls pose a significant threat. Many passages and rooms are flooded
Its population died many years ago, and those who remained turned into wild ghouls. Security robots and turrets are especially dangerous there
Here are the overmare office, the main security office, the main server and the reactor core, which gives energy to the whole stable
Meeting place according to the Mentor instructions

There are many dangers in the ruins of Manehattan. Here you can often encounter squads of slavers and mercenaries. Also, some time ago reports started coming about groups of the Goddess`s alicorns appearing there
A military base in the past, now - base of the Steel Rangers
The former capital of Equestria. Now filled with the deadly Pink Cloud and inhabited by various monsters
A tall, but heavily destroyed skyscraper, in the past - one of the regional offices of the Ministry of Arcane Sciences
Find the way out of the maze. Tip: to get into narrow passages at the height of one block, press [W] + [A] or [W] + [D]
map.help: You will easily find the right path by using an infra-vision potion

map.info: Get to the end without stepping on slime. Tip: use a chemical protection suit to minimize acid damage
Get through the radioactive zone without dying. Tip: use all available means of radiation protection
map.help: For jumping in the horizontal direction use dash move [Shift] + [A], [A] or [Shift] + [D], [D]

map.info: Pressing the appropriate buttons, open all the armored doors
map.help: Only one combination opens all the doors. The hint number is written on the wall behind the box. This number in binary form is the correct code

map.info: Overcome the lift from the working anti-gravity elevator. You need to get the sufficient falling speed
map.help: The third teleport is hidden under the floor

map.info: Activate all the red buttons by shooting them
map.help: To press the lower button, use a grenade together with telekinesis

map.info: Activate two buttons on the sides of the room simultaneously
map.help: To prevent the automatic door from closing place something in the doorway

map.info: By throwing explosives accurately, press all the red buttons. Tip: use S.A.T.S. for better aim. To throw a grenade farther, learn "explosives" skill. You can adjust the force of the throw by changing cursor position
map.help: To press the nearest button use telekinesis with a dynamite stick. To press the farthest button use S.A.T.S. and choose the correct trajectory of the throw. You will need the "explosive" skill of 3rd level at least

map.info: You need to press all buttons. Each button responds to one particular type of damage
map.help: Laser, fire, electricity, acid, plasma, frost

map.info: Use boxes to get to the passage at the top
map.help: Build an inclined tower by placing one box on the edge of the other. After fulfilling the trial, pull out the box at the bottom. Physics!

map.info: Use equipment in the room to get to the passage at the top. Do not fall down!
map.help: Build the tower of boxes on the moving platform. If you drop anything into the pit, exit the room and try again

map.info: Jump on platforms and ladders to get to the top within the allotted time. Too easy? Then do the same with the "left" and "right" reversed!
There is a safe somewhere. Find it!
map.help: There are lots of treasures underground - use a sledgehammer or dynamite to get them. Beware, the ground vibration attracts monsters

map.info: Do you like swimming in radioactive water? Well, you`ll have to, there is no other way
map.help: Drain water by punching out the plugs. Use an anti-radiation suit

map.info: You need to press the button here, then run to the other side before the door closes. It`s simple, just don`t run out of time
map.help: Water at the lower level will slow you down, get rid of it. Use chemicals to run faster and jump higher

map.info: Destroy all bloatsprites` nests
map.help: Bloatsprites are vulnerable to magical energy weapons. Destroy nests as quickly as possible, or they will produce more and more new bloatsprites

map.info: Destroy all ant nests
map.help: Ant nests are most vulnerable to explosions

map.info: Get valuable items from the safe
Data storage and server room. Entrance is authorized only for the overmare, the technical service officer and the sysadmin. Attention! On intrusion, security systems open fire without warning
Can you hold your breath for a long time, navigate through muddy water, fix mechanisms? If not, you shall not pass here
Using moving platforms, get to the safe
Avoid laser traps, disarm them or force your way through
map.help: Laser sensors react only on hostile targets. Like you. They can be disabled having a sufficient level of the "Science" skill

map.info: Get through the passage guarded by turrets
map.help: There is a detonator behind a fragile wall, opening path to the pool with water. Water will protect you from energy weapons

map.info: Defeat enemies under lunar gravity conditions
Make it so that all buttons become activated
Find the passage through the labyrinth of technical compartments
N'ouvrez pas la porte, la mort vous attend a l'interieur

map.n: Quelque part sur le chemin vers Canterlot...

map.info: Une petite colonie abritant un petit groupe de zèbres
Un petit bâtiment où un camp temporaire a été organisé par les Rangers d'Acier sous le commandement de SteelHooves
Les bureaux principaux d'un des ministres de l'époque de la Grande Guerre - Le Ministère de l'Image
Un bunker de stockage appartenant aux Rangers d'acier. Mieux protégé que n'importe quel lieu dans la région. Ce serais de la folie d'essayer de rentrer dedans
Combattez plusieurs vagues d'adversaires, venant l'une après l'autre. Le temps de combat de chaque vague est limité. Essayez de ne pas mourir dans le processus, sinon vous devrez recommencer
Faites briller les 6 boutons simultanément. Tirez très rapidement et précisément !
map.help: Utilisez Little Macintosh et le S.A.T.S.

map.info: Utilisez les sphères obscures pour aller au fond de la pièce. Vous pouvez intéragir avec comme des boutons

Un grand bâtiment construit par l'Enclave au sommet de la montagne. L'Enclave n'a pas fait une seule tentative pour contacter les habitants des Terres Désolées et, à en juger par le nombre de troupes dans la base, il est peu probable qu'ils soient venus avec des intentions paisibles.
Les portes vers la base principale
Le poste de commandement se trouvant tout au sommet, au-dessus de la barrière de nuages. Le commandant de la base doit être là.
Cet atelier est utilisé pour fabriquer des armes à gros calibre. Grâce au puissant et encore fonctionnel système de sécurité, ce lieu n'a pas encore été pillé.
Le quartier général temporaire bien camouflé de la Légion des Zèbres. Selon les bonnes vieilles traditions des zèbres, le chemin y menant est probablement protégé par un tas de mines et de pièges.
Faites briller toutes les cibles en mouvement en même temps.
Ne touchez pas au sol en métal, les escaliers, les poutres et les portes jusqu'à ce que la clôture soit éteinte...
Passez à travers les décharges électriques

map.n: Combat de la Base de l'Enclave
Boss de la Base de l'Enclave

map.info: Un abri secret complètement autonome construit au début de la guerre pour sauver les meilleurs scientifiques et ingénieurs Equestriens. C'est aussi votre maison.
L'une des plus imprenables forteresses d'Equestria. Elle possède de l'artillerie puissante et un système de défense anti-aérien.

map.n: Quelque part près de Stable Pi

txt.n: Attention ! Santé de l'utilisateur critique, continuer la mission est impossible. [br]Début de l'évacuation d'urgence vers la base
Votre santé est critique, continuer la mission est impossible.[br]Allez chercher du soin.
Vous êtes surchargé ![br]Laissez certaines de vos armes au stand d'armes et laissez vos objets dans le stockage
Appuyez sur @1 ou @2 pour vous déplacer à gauche et à droite.
Appuyez sur @1 pour sauter. [br]Restez appuyé pour sauter plus haut.
Appuyez sur @1 pour monter des escaliers.
Appuyez sur @1 pour descendre des escaliers.
Appuyez sur @1 pour ramper et @2 pour vous lever.[br]Rampez pour avancer dans des couloirs étroits.
Appuyez sur @1+@2 pour sauter vers le bas.

Examinez les multiples conteneurs que vous trouverez lors de votre voyage. Cette armoire murale contient probablement quelque chose d'intéressant.[br]Approchez-vous, déplacez votre curseur dessus et appuyez sur @1 pour regarder dedans.
Utilisez la télékinésie pour porter et déplacer des objets. Pour cela, déplacez votre curseur sur l'objet et appuyez sur @1. Pour jeter, appuyez sur @2 encore une fois.

Le mur en bois au bout du couloir a l'air pourri. Il doit probablement être cassable avec quelques coups de sabots. Approchez-vous et appuyez sur @1 pour frapper.[br]Pour un coup de sabot plus puissant avec vos pattes arrières, appuyez sur @2 + @3
On dirait que vous pouvez obtenir des outils utiles là-haut.
Vous avez trouvé un médicament. Utilisez-le pour traiter les blessures que vous obtenez lors des combats. Touche pour utiliser un médicament - @1
Ce mur a l'air tout fissuré et bien moins robuste que les autres murs. Vous pouvez proablement le casser avec un pied-de-biche. Déplacez le curseur sur le mur et appuyez sur @1 pour frapper
Une porte bloquée ? Pas de problème. Essayez de crocheter la serrure, et si c'est un échec, cassez-la avec un pied-de-biche.
En utilisant la télékinésie, empilez les boîtes pour accéder au chemin plus haut.[br]Par défaut, vous pouvez faire un clic droit pour utilisez la télékinésie.
Un pied-de-biche ne sert pas qu'à casser des murs. Entrainez-vous à l'utiliser comme arme sur les radcafards plus bas.
Appuyez sur @1 pour utiliser le PipBuck. Cet appareil possède multiples fonctionalités - allant de la visualisation de votre niveau de santé à la recherche dans votre inventaire.
For easier aiming you can use Stable-Tec Arcane Targeting Spell (S.A.T.S.).[br] To do this press @1 (or middle mouse button by default)
You can switch weapons using PipBuck, numeric buttons or @1 and @2 (or scrolling by default)
Un pied-de-biche ! Vous pouvez autant vous en servir comme arme ou casser des trucs.
A screwdriver! Quite a useful tool. It can help you open simple locks. Try it on that chest
Self-charging pistol - a lucky prize. It belongs to magical energy weapons class, that does not need Spark-batteries. The charge is restored automatically over time
Firearms - you can never get enough of those. Press @1 to reload
You found a book describing spell "Telekinetic bullet". To use it, equip it like an ordinary weapon. Spells don`t require ammo, but consume your magical power
Do not ignore terminals. Some of them may contain valuable data, other can control doors locks, mechanisms, and security systems. Protected terminals can be hacked
You found schematics for a hoof-made weapon. If you have all necessary components, you can try creating this weapon at the workbench
You can jump over this pit, but you will have to run to gain speed and jump right at the edge.[br]Hold @1 while running and jumping to move faster and to jump further!
In case you can`t make it, this thing here will help you this time. But seriously, it is not that hard!
On dirait que vous allez devoir nager. Maintenez la touche @1 pour nager vers le haut et sauter hors de l'eau.
Maintenez @1 et déplacez le curseur pour déplacer la caméra. Appuyez sur @2 pour zoomer
Vous avez obtenu la possibilité de...[br]sauter 2 fois !
Pendant que vous sautez, appuyez encore sur @1 pour sauter une deuxième fois avec la télékinésie.[br]Avec cette technique tu peux sauter plus loin
Vous pouvez aussi sauter 2 fois pour atteindre des lieux innacessible en temps normal.
Hold @1 + @3(@2) to climb one block high without jumping, or climb through narrow passages at the level of one block
Go left to continue exploring the complex. [br]Or go right to go to the surface
Don`t stay long in places with high background radiation, especially don`t linger near magical radiation waste unless you want to experience deadly radiation sickness
Use RadAway to remove magical radiation from your body. Using healing potions won`t help here
Run faster here (holding @1) and you won`t fall
While moving, hold @1 to go upstairs
Hold @1 to raise your weapon higher.[br]You can activate the red button by shooting it
Press @1 to grab the ladder in a jump
You can hide in wall niches, behind crates and furniture. While you are under cover you get bonuses to stealth and evasion. To hide, stand in front of a cover and press @1
It is not necessary to fight every enemy, some of them can be avoided. Wait when enemy looks away, then try to pass unnoticed. Use the wall niche to hide
Holding @1 or @2, press @3 to jump off the ladder to the left or to the right, respectively
Press @1 to jump down off the ladder
Press @1 twice to jump off the beam.[br]While falling, hold @2 to pass through other beams
Holding @3, quickly tap @1 or @2 twice to dash.[br]This trick might help you reach certain places, and you may also use it in a fight
While holding @3, quickly press @1 or @2 twice to dash.[br]By making a dash toward the attacking enemy, you can avoid taking damage
A mark of the Ministry of Awesome points to the secret places and hidden stashes. Sometimes such places are hidden behind fake walls, that can be smashed by any weapon
You would like to offer balefire phoenix some treat, but you do not have anything suitable
Balefire phoenix likes your treat. He makes a melodious trill and disappears. Perhaps you`ll meet again
Your adventures end here. Rest in peace,
You`ve got injuries incompatible with life. Rest in peace,

Entering the door, you will get to a deeper level of the factory. There you will encounter new enemies, new trials and new rewards.[br]Use the MAS terminal to visit the base camp, replenish supplies and restore health
Behind this door is a passage to sewers. You will need a key to open it.[br] Recommended for adventurers of at least 6th level
There is a passage to an abandoned stable. [br]This place is considered quite dangerous. Recommended for adventurers of at least 10th level.[br]Or you can go down to deeper levels of the sewers
Half an hour later, after @lp finished her tale of her Wasteland adventures...

n.r: Rester appuyé sur @1 - lève une arme plus haut
Same while lying by holding both @2 and @1
@1 near a box, a piece of furniture or a niche in a wall - hide behind a cover
Twice @1 - jump down off a beam
@1 + @2 or @3 - crawl into a narrow passage
@1 + @2 or @3 - walk at a slow pace
Quickly press @1 + @2 or @3 - turn around
@1 + twice @2 or @3 - side dash, dodge from an attack
@1 - kick with a front leg, @2 + @3 - back-kick
@1,@2 - weapon selector, view quick access slots
@3 + @1,@2 - change ammunition type
Holding @1 - unload a weapon
In inventory - @1-@2 (digit keys) - assign a weapon, armor, or item to a quick access slot. Press the same key in game to use the assigned item
In inventory - @3 + @1-@2 - the same for additional slots
[Right mouse button] in the PipBuck "weapons" section - hide unused weapons
[Shift] + [click] when trading - select maximum quantity of goods
@1 - use the last attack spell
@1 - use an equipped defensive spell
@1 - order the companion to move or attack
Holding @1 - order the companion to return
[Insert] - redraw the current room (in case of visual bugs)
[End] - command line

[La Grande Guerre] - a global war between Equestria and the Zebras Empire, which happened about 200 years ago. This war ended in the mutual extermination and transformation of Equestria into the Wasteland
[Megaspells] - ordinary spells strengthened by many orders of magnitude, which were used in the Great War as weapons of mass destruction

[Balefire-bomb] - zebra megaspell base on the dragon fire, concealed in a special device. When activated, it explodes with a monstrous force that can destroy entire cities with a shock wave and poison the area with magical radiation

[Pink cloud] - A terrible megaspell that destroyed the capital of Equestria, Canterlot. This is a deadly cloud of an extremely toxic gas of pink color, capable of killing all lifeforms. There is no protection from it

[Stable-Tech] - a corporation that existed before the Great War. Known for building a variety of shelters-stables in which ponies were supposed to survive in the event of weapons of mass destruction going off

[PipBuck] - a portable computer designed by Stable-tech, which ponies can wear on a front leg. It has many functions - tracking the health of the user, sorting inventory, mapping and navigation, viewing any files and keeping records
[S.A.T.S.] - Stable-Tec Arcane Targeting Spell. A special spell built into PipBuck, which allows you to stop the subjective flow of time and help to aim from any weapon

[Stable] - a fully autonomous underground shelter for ponies, designed for long-term use. During the War, more than a hundred stables were built, but most of them, for various reasons, are now abandoned, and all of their inhabitants died

Six government organizations created during the Great War by the ruling princess Luna, whose common goal was to win the War and preserve the state integrity of Equestria. The ministries were ruled by the keepers of the Elements of Harmony. [Ministry of Arcane Sciences], abbreviated [MAS] - a ministry headed by Twilight Sparkle. MAS was mainly engaged in the development of magical weapons and combat spells. [Ministry of Image] is a ministry headed by Rarity. It was engaged in decorating streets, issuing printed materials, and also was responsible for censorship. [Ministry of Peace] - Ministry headed by Fluttershy. It dealt with health issues, production of medicines such as medicinal potions, and helping wounded in combat. It is this ministry that is responsible for the invention of megaspells [Ministry of Morale] is a ministry headed by Pinky Pie. Officially it took care of patriotic education, supporting the population morale and organization of holidays. Unofficially it was engaged in espionage and counterintelligence. [Ministry of Wartime Technology] - the ministry headed by Applejack. It was engaged in development of the newest weapons and means of protection, such as power armor. [Ministry of Awesome] - the ministry headed by Rainbow Dash. What exactly it did was not really known
Que s'est-il passé ? Où suis-je ?
J'ai besoin... de me lever......
Je ferais mieux d'y aller.
Attention ! Signal inconnu détecté.
Décodage...
Signal décodé. Signature PipBuck identifié. Connexion établie. Initialisation du système...
Bienvenue, Nouvel Utilisateur. Ceci est le Système de Secours Urgent par le Ministère des Sciences Arcaniques.
Vous avez été enregistré avec succès dans le système et pouvez désormais accéder à tous ses privilèges.

Dans l'éventualité d'une situation critique pour votre vie, comme : une attaque soudaine de zèbres, action de terreur, explosion de megaspell explosion ou une chute d'escaliers, vous serez automatiquement téléporté au dernier point de contrôle en sécurité - au plus proche terminal MAS disponible. Vous y recevrez aussi un traitement médical nécessaire.
Avertissement : Le système est actuellement en bêta. Quelques erreurs mineurs et dysfonctionnements peuvent se produire. Nous vous remercions pour votre patience.

[Inventory manual] Everything that you find and collect during a journey will be stored in your inventory. You can browse through the inventory using PipBuck (key @1 or @2), [Inventory] section. This section has several subsections that you can switch between using buttons in the upper part of the interface - [Weapons], [Armor], [Equipment], [Ammunition], [Other]

In the [Weapons] section you can see every weapon that you have. From here you can equip it, check its characteristics, condition and how much corresponding ammo you have. Likewise, section [Armor] allows you to equip armor and check its characteristics and condition

Subsection [Equipment] shows all items that you can use - medications, repair kits, books etc. You can use items from here, through PipBuck interface, or in-game using @1 key. Press @5 to use the item, shown in the top left corner of the screen, right below your health bar. Press @2 or @3 to choose the previous or next item. To use medication, you can press hotkey @4 - the most suitable healing potion will be applied
Sections [Ammo] and [Other] contain all the rest - ammo, artifacts, valuable items and garbage of all sorts
Oh non, je ne peux pas sauter au-dessus de ça...
A moins que...
Je pourrais me donner un coup de pouce en utilisant la télékinésie !
A corridor? It seems there is light coming from the right - this is probably an exit
And on the left is just darkness. I guess I should head toward the exit
Or should I explore these catacombs first?
You have successfully reached the exit and are awarded with a level up!
With each level up you receive skill points and abilities. Use them to improve your skills - via PipBuck, the "Status" section - "Skills"
Uh-oh... Quelque chose ne va pas avec cette eau...
Pour autant que je sache , elle ne devrait pas être de cette couleur
Cette tourelle automatique a l'air dangereuse, et je n'ai pas d'arme adapté. Je ne pense pas que le combat soit équitable
Mais ce n'est pas necessaire. Pour aller de l'autre coté je peux passer discrètement
Allez, je peux le faire!
Les tourelles sont des robots défensifs, installés à des endroits particuliers et équipés d'armes puissantes
En mode combat, ils reconnaissent automatiquement les cibles hostiles à proximité et ouvrent le feu sans avertissement

Il y a pas mal de tourelles fonctionnelles d'avant-guerre dans les Terres Désolé qui, même après toutes ces années, continuent de garder les objets confiés. Et cela représente certainement un gros problème pour ceux qui souhaitent obtenir facilement du butin.

Heureusement, les tourelles sont assez faciles à éliminer, malgré leur puissance de feu mortelle. Vous pouvez utiliser des armes perforantes ou à impulsion, ou simplement les fermer via le terminal de sécurité. La partie la plus importante - restez à l'écart des balles, ce qui n'est pas si difficile. Parce que les tourelles ne peuvent pas bouger, elles ne vous poursuivront pas si vous quittez leur détection.

On pense que les bouffisprites sont d'anciens parasprites mutés à la suite d'une exposition aux radiations magiques. Tout en ayant de nouvelles capacités dangereuses, ils ont également hérité du don notoire de la reproduction rapide, vous pouvez donc en trouver un certain nombre dans les Terres Désolé.

Certains d'entre eux sont capables de cracher des épines venimeuses et de l'acide, d'autres attaqueront leurs proies avec des dents très pointues. L'espèce la plus dangereuse injecte des œufs dans le corps de la victime et les insectes nouveau-nés la dévorent de l'intérieur

Bien qu'un seul bouffisprite ne représente pas une grande menace, un essaim peut vous causer de graves problèmes. Ces créatures sont difficiles à tuer avec une balle - essayez d'utiliser de l'énergie magique et des armes de mêlée
Il y a quelque chose derrière ce mur. J'entend un étrange bourdonnement
Hmm... le mur n'a pas l'air très solide. Je pourrais essayer de faire un trou dedans, mais est-ce que ça vaut le coup?
Il y a plein d'explosifs là-dedans ! Je pourrais essayer de le désarmer, mais je doute que ma compétence soit assez élevée
Je pourrais tirer dessu...
Mais dabord je vais peut-être me reculer!
J'espère que les murs ne vont pas s'écrouler...

Soudain, votre PipBuck s'allume tout seul. Sur son écran l'interface habituelle est remplacée par une série de symboles, formant des mots et des phrases. Vous ne comprenez pas ce qui se passe, mais le logiciel PipBuck standard ne peut pas le faire et vous en êtes bien conscient
Salutation, "Chosen-25" @lp. Je suis le Mentor, ma tâche est de diriger vos actions et de montrer la voie
Quoi?! Qu'est-ce que c'est maintenant? Qui me parle... et comment puis-je vous répondre ?

Maintenant, vous aimeriez probablement savoir qui je suis, comment je suis entré dans votre PipBuck et pourquoi vous devriez me faire confiance. Les questions sont plus que raisonnables et j'y répondrai bien sûr du mieux que je peux. Pour l'instant, mon identité doit rester cachée. Une chose que je peux dire, c'est que nous nous connaissons bien, et je ne suis en aucun cas votre ennemi. Ces messages ont été téléchargés à l'avance sur votre PipBuck et vous sont maintenant montrés. Et, si je devine juste ce que vous pensez maintenant - non, il n'y a pas de lien direct, vous ne pouvez pas répondre ou me poser des questions. Pour l'instant. Quant à savoir pourquoi vous devriez me faire confiance, voici mon premier et principal argument
Le PipBuck commence à lire un enregistrement audio. Étonnamment, vous reconnaissez votre propre voix

Salut, @lp du futur - dit @lp, c'est-à-dire toi, il y a quelques jours seulement. - Je t'ai laissé... je veux dire, moi-même... ce message, pour t'expliquer brièvement la situation. Parce qu'il y a quelque temps, tu t'es réveillé dans un endroit inconnu et avec un étrange vide dans ta mémoire. Et donc, puisque je sais que moi, c'est-à-dire que toi, ne croirais personne d'autre que toi-même, laisse-moi te dire ceci : Moi, c'est-à-dire toi, tu es chargé d'une mission très importante. Vraiment important pour toute l'écurie, et moi, c'est-à-dire toi. Actuellement, tu es sous l'influence d'un sort bloquant certains de tes souvenirs. J'ai...tu as accepté de subir ce sort de manière absolument volontaire, sans la moindre contrainte ni menace. Je l'ai fait parce que c'était nécessaire. Fais-moi confiance... c'est-à-dire toi-même

Pour des raisons de sécurité, tu ne te souviendras plus où se trouve ta maison, tes amis et ta famille. Mais sache que c'est temporaire. Pour l'instant, suis simplement les instructions du Mentor, il te dira quoi faire. Il ne te mentira pas, je peux te l'assurer. Pendant que tu es en mission, ton nom de code est "Chosen-25". C'est tout. Bonne chance à toi
L'enregistrement s'est terminé et de nouveaux messages sont apparus à l'écran

Eh bien, maintenant que nous avons terminé avec les questions principales, je vous envoie vos instructions. N'oubliez pas qu'il est dans votre intérêt de les exécuter dès que possible. Bientôt, vous vous retrouverez dans un endroit appelé « le désert équestre ». Soyez extrêmement prudent, selon mes informations cet endroit est très dangereux. Vous pouvez rencontrer des poneys sauvages agressifs et des animaux mutants. Les zones contaminées par des rayonnements présentent également un danger. Essayez d'entrer en contact avec les habitants. Vous recevrez le prochain message le moment venu. N'oubliez pas que votre tâche est très importante pour nous tous. Jusqu'à la prochaine fois, "Chosen-25"
Les messages ont disparu et PipBuck est revenu à la normale. Dans la section "Quêtes", de nouvelles entrées sont apparues
Je me souviens de mon écurie ! Je me souviens de quelque chose... vaguement...
Argh!
Un sort de mémoire ? Comment pourrais-je accepter cela? Mais c'était sûrement ma voix sur l'enregistrement, et si j'étais si confiant à ce sujet... Mentor, alors il devait y avoir une raison
De toute façon, je n'ai pas vraiment le choix. Soit je resterai pour toujours dans cet endroit, soit je vais exécuter les instructions du Mentor, et puis nous verrons la suite
Ce sont les Terres Désolé d'Equestria?
C'est vraiment... grand...
Oh! J'en ai des vertiges!
Je ne peux pas le croire, est-ce que je traverse vraiment dans un trou à rats ?
Pourquoi est-ce que je fais ça ?
Oh, j'ai cru voir un poney par la-bas
E.F.S marque une cible hostile ! Même si c'est un poney, il n'est pas trop sympathique
Encore faut-il vraiment attaquer en premier ? Ou peut-être devrais-je au moins essayer de lui parler ?
Err.. Salut! Tu vis ici? Je...
Que ? Tes qui bordel de merde???|hein? Tes qui toi???
Eh, tout le monde venez! On va s'amuser un peu!
J'ai... tué un poney?!
Non! Quoi qu'il en soit, ce psychopathe n'avait plus grand-chose d'un poney !
Bonjour, mon petit poney. Qu'est ce que tu fais seule ici? Tu veux t'amuser avec nous?
Tu veux jouer, hein ? Eh bien, approche toi, voyons qui s'amusera le plus
Ha-ha-ha, j'adore ! Aujourd'hui est notre jour de chance. Maintenant nous...
Euh, qu'est-ce que c'est que ça?|Qu'est-ce?!
Eh toi! A couvert!
Hé, tu es fou ou quoi, marcher tout seul ici ? J'suis content que j'soit venu juste à temps, sinon tu n'peut même pas imaginer ce que ces raiders f'raient pour toi
Err... merci de m'avoir aidé, mais tout etait sous contrôle
Ouaip sûr. J'pouvais voir ton "sous contrôle". Un poney sans armure sur une arme normale contre tout un tas d'salauds
Et... pourquoi tu m'regarde comme ça?
Je suis désolé je n'ai jamais vu de pégase avant. Dans notre... Je veux dire, dans un endroit d'où je viens, il n'y avait pas du tout de pegase
Ah, Ah t'vois ! Ah j'imagine, nous n'sommes pas si nombreux dans l'Terres Désolés... Attends, t'parles d'quel endroit ?
Eh bien... je suis pas d'ici, je viens de loin

Jusqu'où ?.. 'ttend un peu... laisse-moi d'viner : tes d'l'écurie ? Ma parole ! tu dois être d'là-bas ! Et c'drôle de costume. yep, tout est clair maintenant. J'te dis la vérité, ya si peu d'écuries avec des poneys vivants, que j'vois rarement des poneys comme toi de nos jours
Vous avez raison. Mais n'en parlons pas maintenant, d'accord ? Vous faites partie des locaux, n'est-ce pas ?
Eh bien, on peux dire ça. Ravi d't'rencontrer, j'suis Calamity
Ravi de vous rencontrer aussi, je suis @lp. Écoute, Calamity, à moins que ce ne soit trop compliqué pour toi, pourrais-tu me montrer le chemin vers la ville ou la colonie la plus proche ?
Bien sûr, j'vais même t'accompagner. Ya un camp à proximité, "Le poney de Prancin". Ah, je suis sûr qu'ty trouveras tout c'que tas besoin. Dis-moi quand tu s'ras prêt à partir

Toutes nos félicitations! Vous avez terminé [le premier niveau de l'usine]. Pour aller au [deuxième niveau], passez la porte sur votre droite. À chaque niveau suivant, de nouvelles épreuves, de nouveaux ennemis et de nouvelles récompenses vous attendent ! Vous pouvez également utiliser le [terminal MAS] pour vous téléporter au camp de base pour soigner et réapprovisionner en fournitures
Aha, voyons voir... ça ressemble au plan général de l'usine... .
Maintenant, je suis au premier niveau. Ci-dessous se trouvent les deuxième, troisième et... bien d'autres

Le terminal maneframe que je recherche est dans le département de recherche spécial. Ses entrées sont trois niveau plus bas. Je dois aller plus loin. Oui, et il semble que pour y entrer j'aurai besoin d'une clé d'accès de sécurité
Ouais, cette usine est vraiment énorme. Si je voulais, je pourrais l'explorer pour toujours...
Il semblerait que je suis sur la bonne voie. Le département de recherche spécial est dans le couloir

Allez tout droit dans le couloir pour entrer dans le [Département de recherche spécial] et remplissez votre mission. Ou entrez par la porte [Sortie] pour continuer à explorer un nouveau niveau d'usine. Vous pouvez revenir ici lorsque vous êtes prêt
On dirait que c'est le département de recherche spécial. J'ai besoin de trouver le terminal maneframe
Erreur système. Veuillez contacter l'administrateur

Vous connectez votre PipBuck au terminal maneframe. Pendant un moment, rien ne se passe, puis une série de caractères parcourent l'écran PipBuck, qui sont ensuite remplacés par un indicateur de téléchargement. Après cela, le grand écran du terminal s'anime, et une à une les lignes commencent à apparaître
Autorisation...
Démarage système...
Recherche de fichier...
Fichiers de projet "Rainbow" trouvés ...
Connexion à distance établie. Le transfert commence, veuillez patienter ...
On dirait que tout se passe comme prévu !
Soudain, vous entendez une voix provenant de la dynamique cachée quelque part à l'intérieur de la machine
Bonjour @lp. C'est moi, Mentor. Félicitations, vous avez terminé avec succès votre première mission. En ce moment, nous recevons des fichiers que nous attendons depuis près de deux siècles
Quoi? Mentor? Parlez-vous via ce terminal ? Et je peux te répondre ?

Oui, @lp. Tout à l'heure, votre PipBuck a lancé un programme sur la maneframe, à travers lequel nous pouvons communiquer. Bien sûr, vous avez de nombreuses questions. Maintenant vous pouvez leur demander
Des questions? Oh, bien sûr. Qui es-tu ?... Et qui suis-je ? Pourquoi je ne me souviens de rien de mon passé ? Et... qu'y a-t-il dans ces fichiers que vous cherchiez ?

Les réponses à toutes ces questions sont interconnectées. Je suis vraiment ton mentor, un poney que tu as connu toute ta vie. Je ne peux pas encore dire mon nom. Votre maison, l'endroit où vous êtes né et avez grandi - Stable Pi. Je n'ai pas non plus le droit de divulguer des détails à ce sujet, ainsi que sur les fichiers que vous avez trouvés. Cette information est top secrète. Pour la sécurité de notre maison commune, nous avons dû vous jeter un sort de mémoire. Ainsi, si vous vous faites attraper par un ennemi, il ne pourra jamais rien obtenir de vous. J'espère que vous comprendrez
C'etais vraiment necessaire?

Malheureusement oui. Nous avons beaucoup d'ennemis. Lorsque vous aurez terminé la mission et que vous reviendrez, je supprimerai le sort et les souvenirs vous reviendront. Mais pas avant. Vous avez vous-même accepté de telles conditions, n'est-ce pas ?
Oui, j'ai entendu l'enregistrement. Mais cela ne facilite pas les choses !
Je comprend... mais je sais que tu réussiras
Mais peux-tu au moins me dire quelque chose sur le but de ma mission ?

C'est la principale raison pour laquelle nous parlons en ce moment. Bien avant la fin de la guerre, Stable Pi était un refuge secret pour les scientifiques et les ingénieurs impliqués dans les études les plus importantes pour l'armée d'Equestria. Après la chute des bombes, nous sommes passés à une existence complètement autonome. L'ensemble du complexe Stable est profondément souterrain et vous ne trouverez l'entrée sur aucune carte. Le secret est très important pour nous. Nous ne sommes pas des guerriers, nous ne pouvons pas protéger nos précieuses connaissances de la cupidité des habitants des Terres Désolés. Par conséquent, nous ne contactons presque jamais le monde extérieur
Je vois. Mais pourquoi aviez-vous besoin de m'envoyer à la surface ?

L'un des derniers développements de Stable Pi avant le jour du jugement était le projet "Sun". Je ne peux rien vous dire à ce sujet, mais c'est extrêmement important non seulement pour notre petite société, mais pour l'ensemble d'Equestria. Malheureusement, à ce moment-là, le projet n'était pas terminé, car il était étroitement lié à un autre développement important - en même temps, les travaux sur le projet "Rainbow" étaient menés en parallèle dans les laboratoires ManeTec. Selon nos informations, ce deuxième projet était terminé, et l'ensemble des schémas et documentations techniques devait nous être transmis. Mais pour une raison quelconque, cela ne s'est jamais produit. Les lignes de communication avec leur maneframe ont survécu, mais le serveur n'a pas répondu à nos tentatives pour le faire fonctionner à distance

Et c'est pourquoi vous aviez besoin que je remette ce serveur au travail ? Et pourquoi m'avez-vous appelé "Chosen-25" ? Et pourquoi m'aavez-vous envoyé ? Étais-je vraiment le meilleur choix pour une mission importante ?

Le titre "Chosen" est une tradition. La première tentative d'envoyer un émissaire à la surface remonte à près de cent ans. Ensuite, il a été appelé « l'élu », car il a été élu parmi de nombreux autres candidats pour sa compétence. Il a été transféré dans les Terres Désolés par un sort de téléportation, mais il n'a pas rempli la mission et n'est pas revenu. Ensuite, nous en avons envoyé d'autres. Combattants et diplomates, forts et rusés, des équipes simples et entières. Il y avait donc "Chosen-2", "Chosen-3" et ainsi de suite. Personne n'a réussi. Mais toi. Alors oui, il s'est avéré que c'est toi qui étais le meilleur choix
Eh bien, je suis contente d'avoir pu aider. Maintenant, je dois revenir ?

Je suis désolé, @lp, mais non. L'obtention de fichiers était le premier objectif, mais pas le seul. Pour les projets "Sun" et "Rainbow", nous avons également besoin de certains composants que nous n'avons pas au Stable Pi. Vous devrez les obtenir. Nous avons besoin de temps pour étudier les schémas que nous avons reçus, mais l'un des composants manquants est déjà connu. C'est le Quantum Cogitor, et nous avons la preuve qu'il était stocké dans l'Étable 88 - l'Étable de recherche quelque peu similaire à la nôtre, mais avec beaucoup plus de ressources et axée sur la recherche dans le domaine de la robotique. Malheureusement, pour des raisons qui nous sont inconnues, après avoir scellé l'écurie, le canal de communication avec elle fut bientôt interrompu. Votre tâche est de vérifier l'état de l'écurie 88 et d'obtenir le cogitateur quantique des poneys qui l'habitent. L'entrée de l'écurie 88 est située à un endroit appelé Falls Springs
Le chargement des fichiers est presque terminé, la connexion sera interrompue d'une minute à l'autre. Avez-vous d'autres questions?
J'ai plein de questions, en fait. Que diriez-vous...
Le transfert de fichiers est terminé. Connexion fermée
Bon sang!
Ça veut dire que je suis coincé ici depuis longtemps ? Et en plus, je dois encore risquer ma vie ?
Mais "moi" du passé était confiante dans l'importance de cette mission. Suis-je alors au courant de ma future mission ? Que je devrais rester ici si longtemps ?

Pourtant, même si je ne l'ai pas fait, cela ne veut pas dire que je dois tout abandonner. La tâche qui m'est confiée est extrêmement importante, et cela signifie que je dois la remplir. D'une façon ou d'une autre
Ok, good. Perhaps this cute little piece of metal would also like to tell me something?
Query: The "Sun" project
*Search complete* *Files found: 0* *Logs matches: 5*
That`s it, huh?
Query: The "Rainbow" project
*Search complete* *Files found: 0* *Logs matches: 5*
Arrgh! It looks like the files were deleted from memory after transferring. Great. Just great
Query: Logs for the "Rainbow" project
Looks like I won`t find out anything new... Wait, what?! Well, well...
*File accessed: File was accessed 81 days 5 hours 18 minutes ago from an authorized PipBuck device, serial number PX 457095004132 L*
PipBuck user, huh? I don`t remember seeing anyone on the surface having a PipBuck. What if... what if it was "Chosen-24"?

Yes, that must be her. Perhaps she is already very far from here, maybe even dead. Anyhow, I still have to try finding her. What if she visited the "Prancing Pony"? I must ask Calamity - if anyone saw something, it`s him
Calamity?
Howdy, @lp. Needin` somethin`?
Well, yes. Tell me, in the last few months have you seen anypony like me?
Huh? Ya mean, lookin` like ya? A lil` one? Or an adventurer like ya?
Khmm.. No, not that. I mean, somepony from the Stable

Ah, that kind. Ayep, Ah saw one. A funny character t`be honest, ya could tell that she`s jus` outta Stable. But good. Ah mean, she has a kind heart. Ah also wanted t`ask ya if she was a friend of yer`s, but somehow it slipped mah mind

Anyhow, she came here `bout three or four months ago. She was weak an` hungry, she almost went t` bed but stopped when she noticed Doc`s corner. He was fixin` a couple of our fellas shot by `em Raiders. So she went in, talked t` him about somethin` for `bout five minutes an` stayed t` help. Since then she was workin` with Doc. He praised her a lot, but between us he grumbled that our newcomer was tryin` t` give sick folks medications fer free
And why she is not here anymore? Doctor Sepsis kicked her out?
No, `f course not. But in truth, Ah`m afraid that it`s even worse. But ya know, better ask Doc himself... He`ll tell ya everythin` better than me
Look, Doc, we need to talk. It`s very important...
If it`s venereal, lets discuss your case behind this curtain
No, it`s not that. I want to ask you about a Stable dweller. Did you know her? I was told that some time ago she was helping you here in the clinic

Ah, but of course, I remember her. Velvet Remedy - that was her name. Yes, she helped me here for a while. Very capable, and good in medicine, despite being self-educated. She learned from books, you can see it at once. Little practice, especially in surgery

But very kind, too much even. Wanted to help everypony for free. Not just ponies, every creature. We had a few quarrels with her about this, because her kindness made the clinic go into a negative balance. But we managed to find a compromise

She asked a lot about our life, but above all she was interested in ghouls. Tried to reveal a secret of their anti-life, did not believe my words that this is the black magic of zebras. As a result, she decided to get to the truth herself. Stupid idea, if you ask me. Ghouls can no longer be cured

First she was just searching for them around... I tried to dissuade her, but it was useless. Then she said that she found out where those creatures were most abundant. I guess, in some sewers or other forsaken hole. And then she just left and, well, that`s it. I haven`t seen her ever since
Pity... probably found more ghouls than it was necessary. Be careful, do not repeat her mistake
And you did not even look for her?
We looked. Calamity flew around, even checked sewage pipes. We found no trace
I see... Thank you
That was nothing... And why do you ask? Were you acquainted?
Yes... I mean, no...
I don`t know
Well, I`ll mind my own business then
Stop! It`s dangerous to go further! I need to find another way
A camp? Here? Interesting...
I should look around more carefully
Sooo. No trace of ghouls - that`s good

But there are signs of struggle. The mattress is crumpled, as if a pair of ponies stomped all over it. One stack of books is turned over. Same for the pot and those bottles from the table. They are broken, as if they fell after somepony kicked the table under them with all their strength. Or something like that. And all this remained untouched for quite some time
But most importantly, there is no blood. Perhaps the owner of the camp is alive... I need to look for some more traces
Oh, and here`s the diary! Probably belongs to the owner of the camp. Aha... There is a signature: "Velvet Remedy"
(reads) Well-well-well... She studied ghouls here, conducted some experiments... I need to study the diary in more detail later
However, the camp was empty for a long time, and she clearly did not move out by her own free will. Who could find her here, besides ghouls?... The slavers from the camp above?

n.t: Conversation with the griffins` captives about Velvet
n.r: Psst, be quiet. I`am going to free you now
Thank you, stranger
But if you came for your friend, I am sorry, she`s no longer with us
Wait, who are you talking about?
Another pony. We ran with her from the slavers, and she wore exactly the same piece of metal on her leg as you do. Are you from the same clan?
Please, tell me more

A black unicorn with a silver mane. She said that her name was Velvet Remedy. After the escape, we wandered together for a while. She did not talk much about her past, but she was a very good medic. We separated after we met zebras. These creatures lured her to go with them. They pretended that they were ill, and your friend took the bait. We tried to talk her out of it, but she would not listen. By now she must be in the stomachs of the striped. I am sorry
Hmm... thank you for telling me this

Congratulations! You have completed [the first level of the sewers]. You can leave the sewer system by climbing the stairs, or go deeper by entering the [Exit] door. At deeper levels you will find more enemies, trials and rewards, and at the end of each level you can find the way out as well
Hey! You are not one of them? You don`t look like one of those... please, help me!
What happened? Who put you in a cage?
And who are "they"?
The slavers! There`s a whole gang of them. They captured us during a raid - me and the other ponies. And now hold us in cages until they take us to Filly
They kidnap other ponies to... just use them as if they were some kind of property?
Yes! Please don`t leave me here!
I won`t! Neither you, nor other captives
But the cage is locked... I am not sure that I can handle this lock...
Slavers must have keys. Most likely, the chief warden has a copy. But don`t even think about stealing them, and taking them by force... There are too many of them for you alone
We shall see about that!
Where are the other captives?
I don`t know. Must be in that big building. I hope they are still ok...
I will try to pick the lock on your cage. And if it doesn`t work, I`ll have to get the key
I just can`t believe things like this are actually happening!
Ah, here you are! So, it`s you we should thank for causing us so much trouble?
That`s right. And you must be chief warden? Do you have the keys from the captives` cages?
You bet! You want to free all that meat? Well, I sure have the keys. Come closer... so I can give it to you...
Oh, wow... you are a huge one! Can ponies even be of this size?

Er, shit, I don`t get it! What the fuck is going on here??? What is all this shooting? Did you lose you damned mind?|Er, I don`t get it! What the hay is going on here??? What is all this shooting? Did you lose you damned mind?
HEY, ARE YOU FUCKING DEAF!!?? GET YOUR ASSES HERE YOU BASTARDS, RIGHT NOW!!!|HEY, ARE YOU DEAF!!?? COME HERE YOU BASTARDS, RIGHT NOW!!!
Spare your breath, big boy, nopony comes
What`s this squeaking down there? Who are you, a flea?
Your gang is no more, and your captives are free. Any last words?
I will crush you with my left hoof, little cunt. You are finished| I will crush you with my left hoof, pipsqueak. You are finished

Butch! You son of a bitch! Not only do you not follow my orders, but you also run away so I can`t kick your ass in person? Remember, if I find out that you once again ignore your duties, this operation will be your last in my squad! Did I order you to start looking? I did, even you bitch can`t deny it. You were instructed to get your guys and personally scout the square 15:28 for the entrance to the Stable. It was to be done yesterday! And what the fuck you`ve been doing all that time? Just siting, drinking and scratching balls? Your last chance: tonight you need to take a dozen of your bastards and execute my order to find the house of that sugary bitch with PipBuck, which your guys found a week ago. There might be a bunker just a couple of miles underground filled to the brim with the finest meat, and we can not miss it. Do you understand, Butch? We Can Not! If I come back from the Stable 88, and you are still here - I`LL KICK YOUR ASS OFF! And yes: if I find out that you`ve told guys the real purpose of this little walk, I`ll cut your tongue myself. Sharp Shooter|Butch! You bastard! Not only do you not follow my orders, but you also run away so I can`t kick your ass in person? Remember, if I find out that you once again ignore your duties, this operation will be your last in my squad! Did I order you to start looking? I did, even you can`t deny it. You were instructed to get your guys and personally scout the square 15:28 for the entrance to the Stable. It was to be done yesterday! And what the hay you`ve been doing all that time? Just siting, drinking and scratching balls? Your last chance: tonight you need to take a dozen of your bastards and execute my order to find the house of that sugary lass with PipBuck, which your guys found a week ago. There might be a bunker just a couple of miles underground filled to the brim with the finest meat, and we can not miss it. Do you understand, Butch? We Can Not! If I come back from the Stable 88, and you are still here - I`LL KICK YOUR ASS OFF! And yes: if I find out that you`ve told guys the real purpose of this little walk, I`ll cut your tongue myself. Sharp Shooter
Light, water and fresh air!
FUCK IT!|Sweet!
A note! Let`s see what`s in it?..
Oh, no... Seems like these bastards captured the "Chosen-24"! We need to find her and save her as soon as possible
Who is this Sharp Shooter, a local boss? Judging by the note, he is somewhere in Stable 88. Can`t wait to meet him!
Stop! I do not know who you are, but do not go any further!
Why? What is there?
Not what, but who. Butch, head of the slavers. Huge as a buffalo, and ferocious like a manticore. If he sees you, you are dead!
We`ll see! Don`t worry about me, let`s open your cage
The door to Stable 88... What can I say, quite impressive

You have reached the end of [the first level of the abandoned Stable]. Enter the [exit] door to go to [second level]. At deeper levels you will find more enemies, trials and rewards, and it will help you gain the necessary experience
Hmm... so far I have not seen a place I`m looking for. I need to go into deeper levels
This corridor to the right... As far as I know a plan of a typical Stable, it leads to the Stable Core and the central server. Perhaps the Quantum Cogitator is there?
Go along the corridor to the right to get to [Stable Core]. Or enter the [Exit] door to continue exploring the new Stable level
Report
Err... Boss! There`s not way to get in while this fucking robot is sitting there!|Err... Boss! There`s no way to get in while this fricking robot is sitting there!
Whose problem is this? Mine? I gave the order, it means that the passage must be clear. You were taught dealing with robots
But, ehem... Boss! This is not just any robot! He killed five of ours within seconds!

I DON`T GIVE A FUCK! YOUR TASK IS TO DO AS I ORDER, AND IF I ORDER YOU TO KILL YOURSELF, YOU GO AND KILL YOURSELF! YOU MUST HAVE CLEARED THIS SECTOR THREE FUCKING DAYS AGO! DO YOU UNDERSTAND WHAT IT MEANS? IT MEANS THAT IF AFTER ONE HOUR I COME BACK AND DON`T SEE THIS ROBOT FUCKING BLOWN TO PEACES, I WILL SHOOT YOU! DO YOU UNDERSTAND, SUCKER?! DO! YOU! UNDERSTAND?!|I DON`T CARE! YOUR TASK IS TO DO AS I ORDER, AND IF I ORDER YOU TO KILL YOURSELF, YOU GO AND KILL YOURSELF! YOU MUST HAVE CLEARED THIS SECTOR THREE FRICKING DAYS AGO! DO YOU UNDERSTAND WHAT IT MEANS? IT MEANS THAT IF AFTER ONE HOUR I COME BACK AND DON`T SEE THIS ROBOT BLOWN TO PEACES, I WILL SHOOT YOU! DO YOU UNDERSTAND, MAGGOT?! DO! YOU! UNDERSTAND?!
Got it, boss! Err... We`ll do it right now! Could we, you know... take impulse grenades?

Take everything you need. An hour later this robot must not be there anymore, I don`t care how you do it, you understand? I`m so fucking tired of you morons...|Take everything you need. An hour later this robot must not be there anymore, I don`t care how you do it, you understand? I`m so tired of you morons...
They can`t get through here? Perhaps this is the place I was looking for. And this must be Sharp Shooter. Now, let`s have a chat with him...
Still… what robot they were talking about?

n.t: Notes found on the body of the slavers` chief
n.r: Oh, damn it, he`s dead! How can I learn about other "Chosen" now?
Wait, what is this? Some kind of notes. Let`s see
Just rubbish here. Let`s read further: - Day five. Nothing. - Not here. - No… - Aha, there!
Son of a bitch...|Darn bastard...
She escaped! Holly Celestia, she escaped!

So, only a few hours passed after our conversation, and our glorious, shining, Hope of all Ponies, our Saviour, fuck-his-ass Red Eye has already got rid of me. Send to clear the old Stable? Seriously, bitch? Perhaps I should take a shovel myself, shouldn`t I, our dearest Rebuilder? I have never met such a vengeful bastard in my life. All right, fuck it. At least I`ll have some rest, while my guys have fun shooting at the tins|So, only a few hours passed after our conversation, and our glorious, shining, Hope of all Ponies, our Saviour, kiss-his-flank Red Eye has already got rid of me. Send to clear the old Stable? Seriously? Perhaps I should take a shovel myself, shouldn`t I, our dearest Rebuilder? I have never met such a vengeful bastard in my life. All right, screw it. Perhaps I`ll finally have some rest, while my guys have fun shooting at the tins

Day 1. My detachment gathered at dawn and went out through the northern gate. When I passed under the arch, I heard sentries giggling from the tower. These freaks lost all fear and continued laughing about my quarrel with the "red-eyed", even when I looked in their direction. I shot both of them, because you don`t mess with me. If anyone asks, I say that was for disrespecting the leader

Day 21. The usual routine was interrupted with the arrival of the Butch`s gang. The detachment was sent to prepare maps of underground sewers, and during that task they came across a lone unicorn, playing with some corpse in a dark corner. But this is not the main thing. The thing is that she has a PipBuck. Guards who caught her sincerely believe that this is a scribe of the Steel Rangers. I won`t make them doubt their beliefs, but my experience says something completely different. The Steel Rangers would never have sent out a lone unarmed scribe. In this world, there are only three types of ponies that have access to such rarities as PipBuck: Steel Rangers, elite Red Eye guards and habitants of the still closed Stables. The latter are so rare that many believe there are no functioning Stables at all, but our captive clearly does not belong to the first two categories. Nooo, she`s from a Stable! If so, then, it seems, I am the luckiest bastard from here to Canterlot itself. This little chick looks like she`s just out of a test tube, and she certainly won`t last long in our world. So her house must be very close. If I find an untouched Stable full of residents... this will be the biggest prize in my life!

Day 22. Yesterday I gave my guest a day to wrack her brain and tell me where her home is. Today the time is out, but she is deaf to the voice of reason. She claims that she "does not remember" this. Hah! Unfortunately, today she didn`t say anything important. We will continue our conversation tomorrow. But dear goddess, how sweetly she shouts under the blows of a whip...

Day 25. The prisoner is still silent. Choking in tears, assuring that she remembers nothing, but does not crack. Well, I`ll give her that, in her Stable they really know how to teach keeping their mouth shut. I`ll have to start searching myself. The problem is that among Butches guys there must be at least a pair of spies from my competitors. As soon as they find out that we have found a Stable, they run off the very same evening and report to their masters. Hence, we will support the myth of the Steel-ass`s scribe. I`ll put my most reliable guys at the head of the search teams, only they will know the real purpose of the search

Day 26. Escape of slaves. A newbie guards fell asleep at the post, and several fuckers escaped, including our tough chick. No longer I can hope learning about the Stable entrance from the first hooves. Both of the suckers were hanged at dawn, but what does it matter now? Now we have to rely only on luck and thorough search|Day 26. Escape of slaves. A newbie guards fell asleep at the post, and several captives escaped, including our tough chick. No longer I can hope learning about the Stable entrance from the first hooves. Both of the idiots were hanged at dawn, but what does it matter now? Now we have to rely only on luck and thorough search
The safety force fields are disabled
State of the system: Reactor core: 17.56% power. Central maneframe: operational. Security systems: active. Ultra-Sentinel: active
Attention! Leakage of radioactive materials from the reactor. Visiting the F-17 zone at this time is not recommended
Quantum Cogitator... this is it!
I did it! I did it! Hooray!
But now I need to contact the Mentor. I wonder... can I do it with help of that mainframe? It looks exactly the same as the one at the ManeTec factory...
I really hope it works…

*Installing new device* *Device connected: personal computer "PipBuck", model PX 778185578322 S* *Access rights: guest* *Warning: users of the "guest" category have limited rights. You can: create new text documents, view documents of the "F" category, request a communication session with the addressees from the contact list, adjust the temperature and humidity parameters of the room, play "Guess the Word" game*
Open the list of available contacts
*Contact list: "Internal" category - 47 addresses; "External" category - 35 addresses; "Primary" category - 3 addresses.*
Search: Stable Pi
*Address "Stable Pi": matches - 1. Address status - active. Requesting a communication session...*
*Minutes pass by*
Hello, @lp
Yes, it worked!
Hush, do not shout, I just woke up! Do you even realize it`s two in the morning?
Forgive me, I did not follow the time while I was breaking through the huge Stable full of robots and slavers
Full of what?
Just listen. A large group of ponies is operating here, in Stale 88, who catch and enslave other ponies
I know who slavers are, @lp…
.. which caught the Chosen-24 some time ago and went looking for our Stable
Wait a minute. If there is a threat for the Stable Pi, we will have to take very strict security measures. Are you sure about what you are saying?
Yes, absolutely. I read their orders. However, because of their paranoia, these guys kept the knowledge about our Stable secret which only their officers knew. I eliminated them
Eliminated their officers? That is... impressive

Nevertheless, @lp, with all due respect, I simply can not blindly trust your words. From this day I have no choice but to take additional precautions. For me and you this means that such communication sessions are no more acceptable
So, do you have anything to say about your main assignment?
I have the Cogitator
Splendid! Well done, @lp

So, the situation is as follows: the Cogitator is just one of several elements that we require. The two remaining: the Alicorn Amulet and the Black Book. Those are the ancient artifacts, which were studied before the war pony and were planned to be used in the "Rainbow" project. Both were far away from us in the day when the world was hit by mega-spells

According to our archives, Alicorn Amulet was studied at the Research Institute of M.A.S. in Manehattan, while the Black Book was kept in Canterlot. They are your next goal. About the Cogitator - you need to give it to us. I`ll send you the coordinates and time for our next meeting, where a reliable... pony will be waiting for you. He will talk to you through the sprite-bot. Do not worry, you will immediately recognize that it is the one you need to talk to. He will take the cogitator from you, and then he will tell you whatever you want to know. We still can not let our secrets get into enemy hooves through you, but I think you deserve the right to learn more about your past
Um, no! I`m going to get answers right...
*Connection lost*
...now. Darn it!
Hey, you!
Easy now. I do not wish you any harm, er, metal ponies
I will ask you questions, and you will answer them. Is this your sprite-bot?
What? What do you mean?
I asked you a question. We have a sprite-bot here in front of us. Is it yours?
You are mistaken. I do not own any sprite bots
Hold on, Rose. It seems that we have a misunderstanding
Excuse my friend, little one. She did not mean to scare you
What was that, Diamond?
Be quiet
Tell me, dear, where did you get this thing on your leg?
Stop talking to me like this. And this "thing" belongs to me

Sorry, little one, but you`re wrong. The fact is that such technologies are a legacy of ancient times. And we are Steel Rangers, a brotherhood whose duty is to preserve these technologies. Therefore, we, unfortunately, do not have the moral right to leave such an item in danger

Besides, you`re not here by chance, are you? When we found this bot, it just hovered in one place, hiding in the bushes. Unusual behavior for a thoughtless machine, is it not? All the more unusual is that this robot tried to escape the very moment it spotted us. Somepony controlled this bot, and it was going to meet here with a certain pony, who was by chance passing by this abandoned, uninteresting place at this right moment. Do you understand what I mean, girl?
In short - you are going with us. Now.

Why so rude? Darling, once again please forgive rude Rose. We are not your enemies. But we must take you to our home, where you will give us your PipBuck and tell us where you got it from and who controlled the sprite-bot. This way you will do everypony great favor, I assure you! And for this, we will treat you well and give you supplies for the journey. Deal?
I`d say this was the most unusual attempt to rob me as long as I can remember. No, I`m not going anywhere with you, and I am not giving you my PipBuck. Do you understand?
Yes, wanderer. We understood

Peck, this is Stinker. In short, here`s the situation. My group was reassigned to strengthen the main detachments of catchers, and the supervision of the territory was entrusted to you. There`s no time to look for you personally, so I leave you this note. You may think I`m fucking with you - you can leave everything, run to the headquarters and show her to Tweak, I`be happy to watch as he kicks your butt for "insubordination." I`m serious, buddy, no lies now. You were not at the briefing of the rear-guard commanders, so I`ll give you the short version. We do not really expect anyone, but just in case everypony should watch out for the Steel-asses. These shit-mashers got a habit of sending spies to the places of our operations. Personally I give them no shit, but this kind of surveillance makes the employers nervous. Therefore, it is ordered to shoot every bitch on sight. It is simple to tell one: these gear-fuckers never, under no circumstances refuse to let go of PipBucks. It contradicts their principles or something. So just tell your guys to make holes in everypony who has such a gadget on his leg. And do not kill anypony by mistake, the employer needs locals alive. The convoy will be sent to you from time to time to pick up those ponies that you catch on the perimeter, so you don`t have to separate the group. I hope your guys have eyes sharp enough not to confuse PipBucks with bandages? Haha!|Peck, this is Stinker. In short, here`s the situation. My group was reassigned to strengthen the main detachments of catchers, and the supervision of the territory was entrusted to you. There`s no time to look for you personally, so I leave you this note. You may think I`m joking with you - you can leave everything, run to the headquarters and show her to Tweak, I`be happy to watch as he kicks you up for "insubordination." I`m serious, buddy, no lies now. You were not at the briefing of the rear-guard commanders, so I`ll give you the short version. We do not really expect anyone, but just in case everypony should watch out for the Steel-flanks. Those mud-mashers got a habit of sending spies to the places of our operations. Personally I don`t mind them, but this kind of surveillance makes the employers nervous. Therefore, it is ordered to shoot every bastard on sight. It is simple to tell one: these gear-lovers never, under no circumstances refuse to let go of PipBucks. It contradicts their principles or something. So just tell your guys to make holes in everypony who has such a gadget on his leg. And do not kill anypony by mistake, the employer needs locals alive. The convoy will be sent to you from time to time to pick up those ponies that you catch on the perimeter, so you don`t have to separate the group. I hope your guys have eyes sharp enough not to confuse PipBucks with bandages? Haha!
Here, a good place to look around
You take out binoculars and observe surroundings
There are only ruins everywhere... yeah, the War did not spare this place...
Stop!

A tall skyscraper with a large symbol of the Ministry of Arcane Sciences. Strongly damaged, but even now there are at least thirty floors left in it. Perhaps this is the scientific research institute of M.A.S. If there is a place to look for the Alicorn Amulet, it is there

So, what is a better way to get there... There is no passage from below, everything is covered with debris... But the skyscraper is connected with a monorail road, and you can get there from the roof of a nearby building
But what are these black specks around the institute? I don`t see. Let me zoom in...
Alicorns! Fuck them manticore! There`s a whole flock of them|Alicorns! Celestia darn them! There`s a whole flock of them
But why are there so many? Perhaps that means the Amulet is really there?
Trains used to run on this road... and now it`s just a hideout for bloodwings. But I can use it to get to the tower of MAS
Go to the right to get to the [MAS tower]. Or enter the [Exit] door to continue exploring Manehattan
What do we have here
Looks like a common sprite-bot

On a second glance, it doesn`t. It lacks several elements. The armament was removed, the "infinite" battery was replaced with a more compact and short-term analogue. Inside the case, there is a large cavity in place of the removed elements, separated from other parts with roughly welded planks. No doubt, this is the sprite-bot, which was supposed to take the cogitator from me
So, the meeting failed. Sprite-bot is destroyed, and whoever was going to take the cogitator from me does not have such an opportunity anymore. Oh, buck you Nightmare Moon, freaks!

At least the Mentor gave explanations about two more missing elements of the project. I only need to find them... in the ruins of the two largest cities of the past... where they might be, or they might not. Wonderful, let`s hit the road!
Well, we certainly got somewhere. Looks like here they`re not going to shoot me right away. I need to look around and ask some questions
Welcome to "Prancing Pony" - the most peaceful and safe place in the Wasteland. Here you can rest, trade, repair equipment and get medical treatment
Please obey the rules. Fighting, shooting, stealing and furniture displacement are prohibited. Violators will be terminated

n.t: The Health section of your PipBuck
n.r: Remember to often check your health condition! To do that, go to "Health" section in your PipBuck.

Don`t forget, you won`t survive long using health potions only. They sure make you feel better, but don`t get rid of serious injuries and traumas. If you like to scout in all sorts of dangerous places, but are not an expert in medicine yourself, you definitely should visit a doctor on a regular basis
Use a workbench if you need to create, repair or improve your equipment
